First, let me say, I am VERY picky about sleep sacks/wearable blankets. And the reason I am so picky is because my daughter has major opinions about what is an acceptable sleep sack. Now, I bought this for my sister who is expecting a baby in September, and we have no way of knowing whether her little one will be as opinionated as mine, but better safe than sorry! This sleep sack is the perfect weight--heavy enough to keep baby warm on cold winter nights if worn over fleece, footed pajamas, but not so heavy that it would be stifling on cool summer nights over cotton, non-footed PJs. The fabric is super soft, and the bear on the front is embroidered rather than cheaply printed on. It is about as long as 9 month footed PJs from Carters. I know that sounds like kind of a silly way to describe the length, but it just shows that a 3-6 month old should fit comfortably inside the sack with plenty of room for their toes (something that my daughter was VERY adamant about needing). My only complaint is that this sleep sack closes with 6 snaps instead of a zipper. When it comes to dressing babies, convenience is SO important--especially when your baby poops every 2 hours like my daughter did until she was 4 or 5 months old. However, the snap closures are only a slight bother. Overall, this is a great sleep sack in lovely, 100% organic cotton for a very reasonable price. I am quite pleased with this product and will definitely be buying one for our next baby!

This review is for the LXS Women's Summer Dress Vest Skirt Sleeveless....
I am 5'5, 125 lbs, 34DD. I ordered this dress in M and it fits perfectly. The material is a medium weight jersey, not too thin so that it shows every bump and garment underneath, but not so thick that it's like a blanket. It is quite stretchy so it contours comfortably but tight enough that it keeps a flattering shape.
It reaches right to my knees so it is discreet enough to wear to work but still sexy enough to wear out for drinks afterward. The armholes are fairly wide, so they don't pinch or get wadded up in your armpit. The back and shoulders are wide enough that regular bra straps are completely hidden but a racerback would fit nicely as well. The neck is wider than a crew but still modest.

I highly recommend this comfortable, versatile and classy dress and will be ordering it in more colors soon!

I did purchase this dress at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

Okay, so from the title, you can expect that I won't be wearing this dress much, but I'll tell you a little more about it than just that issue. This dress overall looks super cute. I love the print. Vibrant, looks just like the picture. The fabric is very thin and lite, which is great for being out in the sun but I recommend a slip underneath just in case it's a little see-through. Otherwise the fabric is very comfortable and flowy. Great summer or spring look!
The place where this dress went wrong is the size. I'm 5'7" and usually fall between a size 10 or 12 dress, and buy medium size clothes typically. I went with a medium on this dress. The length surprised me in that it actually was a decent! Not super short, no butts flying out, but still shows some thigh. This isn't the norm being a bit taller when buying dresses so that surprised me.
But then there's the top. The elastic band looks TINY and stretches out to about my bust size (band size 34/36). However. This bust of the dress is not made fore someone with larger than a B cup, at least in the medium. I'm a cup C, and I couldn't get the elastic band over my boobs to sit on my bustline. And there was no way this was getting pulled on over my hips. Eventually I wriggled it down  and over my boobs... which is when the seam on one side at the armpit promptly busted open. So that was fun. I do not recommend in the slightest for girls with much of a chest!! I'm thinking I can do some doctoring to save the skirt and just have that, so hopefully something came out of this cute outfit.

I ordered this Aberry Gypsy Tankini for summer. I absolutely loved the colors of this bathing suit, and wanted it for summer so very, very bad. I saw the bathing suit and was offered the chance to get it at a discounted price for my honest and unbiased review.
First, let me start with the good! The bathing suit is colored so very pretty and looks a lot like the pictures. The bathing suit came in the mail at a much quicker rate that was expected. The bathing suit fabric is much like most bathing suit fabrics.
now, let me talk about the bad things about the bathing suit! I do not like that you have to base your size order as a set. for example, I wear a medium/large top and a small bottoms, but that was not an option. I looked at the size chart, and thought maybe it ran a little small, and ordered a medium. my band size is a size 34, and I usually wear either a medium or large bikini top. the medium is a tiny bit large, but not too much that I cannot wear it. the bottoms are a medium, I typically wear small bottoms, and they are somewhat big. I really did not like the fact that I had to order the bottoms of the bathing suit and the bathing suit top as the same size. if it were not for the fact that I could not order my bottoms and bathing suit top as different sizes, I would definitely give the bathing suit five stars.
summary: I absolutely loved the colors of this bathing suit

I am fairly new to yoga and this was my first experience using yoga socks.  Honestly I was a little too embarrassed to wear them to my yoga class, so I just tried them at home (I'm also pretty sure my yoga instructor would have had a field day had walked into class wearing these...)
However, they are very comfortable and are very "no-slip"!  I love the toe sock design since often in yoga you need to fan out your toes for stability. I enjoy wearing these socks, especially when doing more challenging poses. However, there is something to be said about doing yoga barefoot (maybe I'm a purest...)
Disclaimer: I received these socks for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review

I don't like to wear shoes for some of my workouts, but don't want to be barefoot at the gym, either.
These No Slip Grip socks are terrific! They may look kind of funny, but they do work.
You get a pair of no slip socks and one is made for each specific foot- not interchangeable.
They have a great fit and really stay on ( made of  75% Cotton, 20% Polyester and 5% Spandex)
The cotton blend breathes and helps prevent odors, which is a nice feature.
The socks don't slip at all and are comfortable to wear during exercise or even stretching.
These socks can be cold-water washed and then put in the dryer (make sure they are inside out!)
Maybe the manufacturer will start making these socks in fun colors- that is the only improvement I can think of!
*I received this product for FREE in exchange for my unbiased review.

One of the things that I have started since working on becoming more healthy is barre and Pilates. These techniques are all about position and simple movements but if you are not prepared you feet slip all over the place, meaning your positions are off and you are probably wobbly and falling down. These are what we call grippy socks that allow your feet to stay in place without a ton of exta effort.

Pros:
-Fit well
-Grippies on bottom of feet and toes
-Simple low cut socks

Cons:
-Bit thick

These socks have come in very handy for my exercising efforts. The grippies on the socks work well and my feet did not slip anymore. I found the socks to very comfortable and easy to wear for a long time but overall I think they were thicker than I would have wanted from a workout sock. They are machine washable and fold up easy for storage. I have enjoyed using my new socks and my positions have all gotten better.

I received these socks complimentary for my honest and unbiased review and opinion. Opinions expressed are mine and mine alone and may differ from yours.

reviewText:
This dress is nicer than I expected.  The fabric, albeit thin, is very soft and pleasant to the touch.  It's thin and unlined, but skims the body nicely.  The sewing on the dress is quite superb, certainly better than I expected it to be, so it is a pleasant surprise to not find any loose strings or crooked hems on a dress at this price point.  The skirt hangs well and is very full.  It looks especially darling over a crinoline, and I plan to pair it with a few different lengths and colors.

Remember when ordering that this is not standard US sizing, so you may want to size up by one whole size.  I did that, and I found this fits quite nicely, so I would recommend that as a universal rule.  It's still kind of small in the chest for me, but I can tell that it would be too big elsewhere if I sized up even more, so I can live with feeling a little bit restrained in that region.  The fit of the dress is very flattering, though I have a larger bust and spill out of the top just a bit.  It's nothing too vulgar, though.  Even after a long day of wear it doesn't wrinkle severely, which is nice.  I love the detail that goes along the back -- it's almost a collar of its own, a little "flap" if you will.  It's a cute and unexpected detail to give a black dress a little more character, which is a welcome addition in my book.

I'm overall very pleased with this purchase.  The styling is very on point for me and I love the added details.

Please be advised that I received this dress at a discounted price in exchange for expressing my honest opinion in this review, but that the opinions I have expressed above are entirely my own and are not influenced by that discount.  I am neither punished for leaving a negative review nor rewarded for being complimentary.
summary: Cute, versatile, and classic black dress.

reviewText:
Im very happy with this dress. I usually order a small, but after reviewing the chart I opted for a size medium. Overall, the dress fits very nicely. I do need to hem the dress a bit, but thats almost always the case even when I get a size small since Im on the short side. I also need to bring the top in a slight bit, adjust the shoulders. But, I feel like my bust fits better in this size, and looks better too not being crammed in.  Im 53 and about 130 pounds and a 36C. The fabric is very nice, soft and high quality. The seams are all sewn well, very straight. The dress irons and steams very well. I love to wear vintage dresses, and have a few different crinolines I would like to wear with this one.  Ive uploaded one picture where I pinned the hem up a bit and tightened the shoulders so I could see how it will look when Im done. I absolutely love it! Its a gorgeous dress. Now I need somewhere to go in it besides just to work.

PROS
 Well made, seams are straight
 Fit was as expected
 High quality fabric
 Soft fabric, comfortable to wear
 Irons and steams wrinkles well, doesnt not wrinkle easily
 Product care tag inside
 Flattering fit
 Cute back collar

CONS
 None

reviewText:
I ordered this swimsuit in a size M (US8). This is the size I generally wear in swimsuits, and it fits perfectly.

I love this suit! It is well-made and very flattering. My only real problem area is my stomach since I had 3 children all very close together. The suit has an extra layer of fabric that really helps hold in my jiggle. Many skirted suits have a mesh or lightweight fabric that connects the bottoms to the top of the skirt. This suit has regular swimsuit material all the way up, and then the skirt goes over the top of that. I look like I have a flat tummy! And its not at all uncomfortable.

The tie at the bust is actually a strip of fabric from the inside and a strip from the outside that get tied together. In one of my pictures, I left it untied to show that (if preferred) the tie could be cut off to give a more modest look to the suit. I really like how it looks when tied, however. There are 2 rounded, molded cups in the bust that are not stitched down. They do move around when the suit is first being put on, but they don't move a lot while Im wearing it. I would prefer a teardrop shape cup for a more natural look, but these do give that pinup look to the bust.

The straps that tie at the neck are wide, which adds so much to the comfort of this suit. I also like the elastic at the top of the back because it is comfortable and doesnt roll.

I would highly recommend this suit for style, quality, and true fit.

I received this swimsuit for free in exchange for my honest review. I did not receive any other compensation, and I am not obligated to write a favorable review. I have used this product myself, and all words in this review are my own.

My casual watch, when I'm not using my Moto 360, is a leather band watch. Over the years, the band has begun to wear down where the holes in the band is starting to get stretched and the leather is starting to show signs of wrinkling. But what I didn't really like was the visible white stitching on the band. While it really does give it a casual look, I prefer the stitching to match the leather. Well, these aren't real leather, but PU leather. Either way, they feel nice and soft, unlike some other bands I've tried previously. The ends where the watchband spring bars go in have a plastic tube in them. I wasn't really sure if I'm supposed to put the spring bars inside or if they were just placeholders to keep the opening open. The spring bar did fit inside, so I just kept the plastic tube in place. The band fits nicely and I wanted to show the difference (only took a picture with the top installed) between the old and new band. As I don't have a gold tone watch to use the brown band, I'll save it for now and maybe I'll get another watch later. These aren't the highest end bands, but they are well made and the stitching is done nicely. They don't give off a vinyl smell and work well with my watch.

I received this product at a discount/free for my honest feedback.
summary: Nice PU leather bands. Great price for a pair of bands.

reviewText:
These watch bands are a great value, especially for the fact that two are included. This is a great option for replacing your watch bands at a value. You can clearly see that the material is faux leather and if you are looking for something high quality I would not recommend these bands. You get what you pay for and you can clearly see the quality at first glance.

Fabulous beach tote! Very roomy and great price. I would buy another in a different print in the future.  My only complaint is that the bag needed a little pressing bc of the wrinkles, but other than that it is awesome!

This bag exceeded my expectations in so many ways! First off it's HUGE, like huge huge! It's about 16.5in tall and 18in wide. That makes it nearly as large as a weekender I own from a big name company! It has a quality snap that holds it closed which is a great feature many beach bags are lacking. The fabric is sturdy and the seams are well made. It's even lined which is a really great feature. There are a few pockets on the inside. One is even zippered so you can easily store your keys or wallet out of sight from others. The straps are nice and thick and will easily hold a lot of weight due to their size and thickness. The fringe, on the ends of the handle, is adorable and long enough that I'm not worried about the knots ever coming undone. The colors are very beachy feeling and the anchor really tops this off as the perfect beach bag feel!! I easily stuffed beach towels, a portable waterproof Bluetooth speaker, snacks and water for the day and still had plenty of room left for a book, my wallet, the keys and a few beach toys!

If you are looking for a quality beach bag that will fit ALL of the essentials and more look no further you will not be disappointed with this bag!

I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review. My opinions are solely my own and are only made after throughly testing a product.

This is one of the largest and cutest bags I have ever had!  The bag has bold stripes of dark blue, white and a mint color on one side of it. The other side has a large blue anchor on a white background background. The inside is lined and it has a large pocket with a zipper.  There is a magnetic snap to help close the bag. The handles/straps are made with a large rope that knots at the bag and is undone to create tassels.  There is plenty of a drop from the handle to the bag to be able to carry it very comfortable.
The bag is huge, I do not even know what to compare it to. I knew when I ordered it said XL but I was not expecting this size!  I have already used it to carry several things that I normally would have to carry in about 4 sacks.  I think it would really cute for an overnight/weekend bag, trips to the lake or beach, I can honestly even see myself toting items from the warehouse club that do not provide sacks.  The bag is very durable feeling, I had it loaded to the top and I had no fear that it would come apart or rip.  The look is very trendy, as the mint color and anchors are pretty popular in the area I live in.  So if I have not expressed it enough, I absolutely love this bag, I wish I had a small version of it as well, so I could use it as my purse, then I could take it everywhere!!  I received the anchor bag at a discounted price in exchange for an unbiased review, which I have gave after using the bag.

bag is made of a soft canvas feeling material

What a beautiful beach bag! I live 3 hours from San Diego so I try to get out to the beach as much as I can in the summers so Im always looking for nice beach bags. I usually use the big reusable shopping bags you can get from Marshalls because I never see a tote bag that is big enough for my stuff, but those straps always break so quickly and the tote rips. I was nervous that this bag wouldnt be big enough, but it is!! I put my large Costco beach towel, beach blanket, wetsuit, sandals, and still had space if I wanted to squish in another towel or something.
The material is really nice, the bag part is like a softer canvas and the rope handles are soft too, so no worries about rug burn! The stripes are navy blue and teal with the same color teal band on the top/inside of the bag. The rest of the inside is lined with a nice beige material so its nice and bight inside, easy to find all your things. It has zipper compartment inside, about 10 inches wide and 5.5 inches deep, plenty of space for smaller items like your wallet, phone, & keys. The tote also has two open pockets on the inside, one measuring about 5 inches wide and 5.5 inches deep and the other measuring about 3 inches wide and 5.5 inches deep (this smaller pocket fits my iPhone 5 with thick case perfectly). The bottom of the bag is a bit cushioned, maybe about a quarter inch thick? I included a picture to show the cushioning.
Yes, this bag did come a little wrinkled but not even close to as bad as some of the review pictures before mine so Im thinking they have changed the way they pack these. The (not so noticeable) wrinkles in my bag are just from where it was folded (which should be expected since it did come in the mail) and are coming out easily on their own as I use the bag. I searched the bag over to look for stains (like one other customer had) and this bag had absolutely no stains.
The material is 100% cotton inside and out. The tag says you can clean this bag by wiping with a soft dry cloth, but I may try to machine wash in a garment bag in the future if I get it really dirty I honestly don't see why you wouldnt be able to, maybe just an issue with the rope handles but the garment bag should protect it. Ill update if I ever get to that point. I think Im going ot spray some scotch guard to the bottom of the bag just to make it easier to keep clean.
I did receive a discount for this tote in exchange for my review, but I honestly love this bag! I am very particular about the items I buy or use and this is a great tote bag!

reviewText:
My husband is not a brief's man but he loves these! He says they're super comfortable and he likes that they don't constrict his movements when working; they're very flexible and easy to move around in.

The material is also very soft and silky, which brings me to his one complaint. He has to wear his shirt tucked in for work (it's a rule) but with these on, the shirt is constantly coming untucked since the material is so silky (even with him wearing a belt)! So, due to this, he no longer wears these on work days.

So, if you have to wear a shirt tucked in, just know that these will cause it to come untucked pretty easily. Other than that, they're very comfortable, super soft, flexible, wash easily (don't shrink), and have beautiful and vibrant colors.

A free item was provided for evaluation and unbiased review.

I purchased this watch for my mother, who is blind.  We have had numerous talking watches in the past, and they always stop talking sooner or later and become useless to my mom.  This one never talked at all. I followed the directions to "wake it up" and the second hand started to move very fast around the dial.  The voice  ("set the time, set the date", etc.) never said a thing.  Tried a new battery, tried resetting the second hand...everything I could think of.  I finally returned the watch to Amazon. It gets two stars because it does keep time with the hands, but that isn't useful to a person who is blind.

This watch looks really nice - elegant and good quality.  I bought it as a gift for my Mom who is petite and older, so needs big numbers.  This is perfect for her.  Set-up was as expected - a bit challenging.  The instructions that come with the watch aren't the best, so you may need to rely on customer reviews or find the website.  My Dad is a typical man, so spent entirely too much time trying to figure it out himself before he even looked at the instructions.  He finally got online (not sure what he looked at) and got it all set.  As for the voice - it is a bit scary and a bit gravelly - not super clear.  It may take some getting used to.  I wish it was a female voice.  Oh, well.  But it is definitely loud enough and eventually will prove its worth since my mother is beginning to slip mentally and is constantly asking us what time it is.
Love it, when I'm multi-tasking sometimes I can't always look around for what time it is, talking watch meets all my expectations.

reviewText: I want to start off by saying that the pattern design of this travel bag is really cute and I like the material as well. What is neat about this bag is that it comes with a hook, which came in handy. So far I've only used this at the gym when I took a shower and it worked out great because I was able to hang it onto the shower pole and have what I need within reach. No more having to place my stuff in little zip lock baggies. This keeps everything nice and organized, making it a lot easier to take what I need and store it back into place. I also like that it folds and doesn't take up much space. I'm excited to use it for when I go traveling, which will be soon. Everything I need fits in here since I use small travel size. If you're planning on packing full-size products, then this is not the bag for you because it is meant for smaller sized items. I'm able to fit my soap, shampoo, lotion, toothpaste, toothbrush, q-tips, dry shampoo, make-up, makeup brushes and I still have room for more. I like that in the big pouch there are pockets to keep bottles in place which is nice. I recommend this to anyone who is looking for something to use for travel and isn't planning on taking too much with them. I was given this product at a discounted price for my honest and unbiased review.

This bag is the perfect size for travel. I have had several other hanging travel bags and it's like really?!? They had room for everything in your bathroom drawers and cabinet and when you added them to your suitcase you needed to take an additional piece of luggage. This one is the perfect size for travel. It holds plenty of what you need to take with you. Shampoo, conditioner, make-up, liquid soap, Q tips, a little first aid kit, make-up remover sheets and on and on. So you don't have to leave what you need at home you can pack all that you need in this little hanging case. The zippers are sturdy. The bottom opening is wide and holds a surprising amount of things. The hook is at the end of a tether that is securely sewn into the top flap of the case. The case has a handle so that you can carry it easily to and fro as needed. I tried the hook on several different items and it fits around a fairly large circumference. It can also hang off of an open drawer. It's one of those small and mighty items that I am always looking for. It doesn't take up too much space but it holds a lot. This is a really great hanging cosmetic bag with multiple zipper compartments. It cleans up easily and stores pretty flat

This is a beautiful canvas bag! I was actually quite pleased and impressed with the quality of the bag when it arrived- especially for such an affordable cost! I'm almost too afraid to use it as a beach bag and risk harming it or filling it with sand because it's so soft and perfect to use as a nice handbag or even possibly an overnight bag if you travel light.

 I got the navy blue anchor bag and the pattern is just beautiful. The exterior is composed of a nice textured yet soft canvas fabric with various anchor prints. The soft accent synthetic leather used for the handle, zipper trims and the exterior base of the bag is the perfect camel color to play off the navy blue and there are gold studs on the underside of the bag to prevent scuffing as well as a decent gold zipper across the top and inside of the bag.

The inside liner of the bag is a nice soft linen colored cotton. I was honestly expecting a very thin see-through liner as some other bags I've received off Amazon had but was completely surprised to find the liner of this bag to be rather thick, not see-through at all (even for the pockets) and of a great quality fabric. (I think this furthermore adds to the reasons why I don't want to take it to the beach and risk spilling lotion or what not inside). There's an inside zippered pocket with more accent leather on the one side and then 2 open pouch pockets on the other side of the interior. The stitching of the bag appears to be of great quality as well and there are no visible flaws or pulls in any of the threads.

 I think for it to be advertised as a beach tote I would expect the bag to be quite a bit bigger in person- it certainly wouldn't fit a decent sized beach towel amongst other beach essentials but if it were being used to carry all your other beach essentials alone without a towel or clothing then possibly I could see this working for that use. Overall I'm very happy with this tote and pleasantly surprised by the great quality and I definitely would recommend this bag!

Disclaimer: I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

Oh man. I saw this bag and fell in love. I LOVE anchors. I also love large purses. This bag was everything I hoped it would be. I love the small anchors in different styles. I love that it has a strong strap and can hold a lot of weight. I love that it zips shut. I love that it is huge inside and can fit all of my stuff AND all of my son's stuff. The bag is well constructed and while it had a funny smell when it first arrived, it went away within a few hours of use. The outside of the bag is canvas and the handle is leather (maybe pleather?). The zipper is large and easy to zip and unzip. In the video I show just how much stuff this bag can actually hold and I have to say it is impressive even to me. I switched to this from a diaper bag. My son is still in diapers but I was sick of carrying around a bag that was so obviously a diaper bag. I am so happy I upgraded to this La Cle bag. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a large, cute bag that can serve multiple purposes. ***Disclaimer: I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.***

These are pretty good quality black crew socks. Just thick enough to be very comfortable, and they hold up well in the wash. I bought this pack to add to my more formal wardrobe (church and work attire and what no) and they are just what I was looking for. They feel nice to the touch, soft and somewhat thicker than your typical formal socks. The color is dark black, just like they appear in the picture. The height of the sock is great, not too high, but high enough to cover my ankles and shins. My feet look shape in these socks. The grey color on the toes and heel does not appear when I'm in shoes, but they grey patches are on full display when the shoes are off. I like how it communicates to people, "work time is over. It's time for play." I recommend these socks to anyone looking for comfortable, well-fitting black socks.

reviewText:
You know what? the shirt is as expected. IT is huge around the torso, which is what is advertised, and the sleeves are slightly skinny. But overall, that makes this shirt the oddball that I expected it to be. I have to say that I really would have liked it if the FABRIC was not so thin!  Seriously, peeps, it is stiff like cotton, it feels cottony in sheen and texture, but if you stand against the light and have uncontrolled little or big love-handles (and who doesn't when wearing slightly-slipping leggings), I would venture out to say that they will be silhouetted against the light. So, what's a viable solution? Well, hell, wear it at night when playing with Dracula. Or run through bright light pretending you are Dracula rather than standing like the model in the picture. Yeah....no.

RECAP: Love the funkiness of the shirt and it's hidden pockets on the sides, but the fabric is totally stupid. Go spend money on slightly better fabric and just be you.

reviewText: Terrible quality, cheap. To boot, I have to pay to return it :( so annoyed. I bought great dresses from them, surprised that this skirt was such a bust.

I'm exactly six feet tall.  I have relatively wide shoulders and a somewhat muscular chest.  I bought the large.  This thing fits awful, it feels like I'm wearing a boy's bathrobe, the bathrobe just barely overlaps my torso by about an inch or so, meaning it's pretty much wide open, even with the belt tied around it, defeating the purpose...even more so once I start walking just a few feet down the hall.  The length is okay, better than most bathrobes, but still ends at the bottom of my calf muscles not at the ankles and feet as shown in the picture.  Also, it should be noted that it's 100% polyester.  I'm not sure if I'll return it for a bathrobe that fits better or keep it for guests, there's not much out there that's roomy, large, dark, tall and has long sleeves, unless you want to pay a couple of hundred dollars.  It's not important to me that it's a "Sith" robe, I bought it simply because I thought it would be roomy and old style, covering enough for quickly answering the door or getting the mail in the morning type of thing...unfortunately, by the time I get to the door, the family jewels are out there for all the world to see, the fit is too narrow!

One last thing: the belt sits way too high on the robe...the belt loops are up near my rib cage rather than down by my waist.
summary: Length okay but among other things, too small around the torso.

reviewText: I wore this dress on New Year's Eve 2016. It fit wonderfully and I must say, I looked stunningly sexy in it! I felt great! I am tall (5'11") with a long torso, so the dress was probably a bit shorter on me than other ladies. However, that's what gave it the sexy look on me. I ordered a size 16, which was a size 4XL by this manufacturer. It fit true to size and the dress was very comfortable. The dress is navy blue and I wore silver sparkeled pumps and complimentary silver and rhinestone jewelry. It all looked perfect for NYE. One note: I did sew on a hook and eye at the collar. There was one button with a loop closing at the top of the collar area but it needed the additional hook and eye closing to give the back key-hole opening the proper look. Beautifully comfortable dress for an amazing price!

reviewText:
I was cautious due to the reviews stating it fit smaller than expected, but considering I am petite, I took a chance and decided to purchase the Navy/White bikini in a size "small".

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Here is my measurements and the sizes I wear for these types of items just in case there is anyone browsing this bikini that is a similar build and would find the info handy:

- 28" under bust
- 32" around bust
- 35" around hips

- 28D is what I have been sized for as far as padded bikini tops and bras go
- 32C is what I can wear (for brands like Victoria's Secret who sell padded/lightly padded tops that don't carry smaller band sizes)
- "small" in tops that are a fixed size (unless the cup area is real small)
- "small" in most bikini bottoms (may it be tie or fixed, unless they run small like the VS PINK line)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

As for the item itself...

BOTTOM:
- fit very well
- comfortable
- no cutting into my sides for a fixed bottom (no string to tie)
- gave me ample coverage on the front and back (I don't have what some would consider a "big butt", but the bottoms cover the appropriate areas needed)
- they do sit a little low, but not so much to where the area will be exposed if active
- I can walk, sit, and stand back up without it riding up on me like crazy (you know how it is with some bikinis)

TOP:
- fits nicely, no constriction
- gave the coverage I needed over my chest area (with a tiny bit of side bits peeping through, but I figure that's expected with a high neck top)
- doesn't sit too high up on my neck, nor was it loose
- the padding is not SUPER thick, nor are they the push-up kind, but there's enough in the top to give the right amount of support
- enough of a top band that is wide/thick to make a bow/knot to your liking for comfort
- the lower/bottom band is also wide
- the bottom band has a plastic clasp that snaps in the back, so it is fixed and you may need to keep an eye on the clasp if you wear it a lot over time

(NOTE: being small under the bust, the lower band was real loose on me when clasped together. I will have to make a small adjustment where I will have to cut the band and sew the clasp where I need it, or remove the clasp all together to sew in some similar fabric that would allow me to tie it. Not a biggie for me, but keep that in mind if you measure about the same as I do in that area.)

OVERALL:
- the material is decent and you can't see through it in well-lit rooms/sunlight
- enough elasticity to be comfortable and give the right amount of coverage needed (do note that it's not super stretchy, but just enough to fit the size it's intended for with wiggle room without feeling constricted)
- well-made and doesn't seem like it would come apart easily, especially the bands
- the design is a modern *and* classy look that would suit teens and adults
- with enough care after each wear, it should last for years

I'm extremely satisfied with the purchase and plan to mostly wear it for casual swimming and activities, but I don't think you'd have to worry about any "pop-outs" if you wear it while being more active. This very same bikini has been added to a few online shopping sites (in only 1 or 2 colors) for this summer, so if you are wanting to get this, this seller is your best option for the price with the various designs and colors (as well as being Prime eligible).
summary: Really good material, nice style, comfortable to wear, and you can't beat the price.

reviewText: I work in the operating room at a hospital and needed a bag to carry my reference materials, personal items, etc etc. that could be wiped down with sanitizing wipes every day - so no canvas, cotton or other absorptive materials. I needed something big enough to hold a couple of small books, stethoscope, pager, etc but not so big as to be a bulky addition to an already full workspace. This bag fit the bill 100% and the price is perfect. The big outside pocket is great for loose papers, pens, etc - the smaller outside pocket fits my portable phone charger block perfectly - and the inner compartment has one small pocket that's great for loose items like hand lotion, lip balm, etc. The main compartment is a nice width so my reference materials all fit well without being crammed too tight. Quality seems high, zippers all move smoothly, seams look solid so far. I'm quite happy with it.
summary: Perfect small tote bag for work

reviewText: FINEJO Women Chiffon Round Neck Sleeveless Maxi Dress Size: M This is such a beautiful and fun dress. I absolutely this boho chic dress. I can't wait to wear it. This dress by FINEJO is a well design garment. The flowing chiffon feels so light and airy. Just looking at this dress makes you think of summer. The gentle round neckline and tie is very flattering. You can wear it tied or loose to change it to a "V" neckline. It is sleeveless and features a three tier skirt. There is a side zipper for easy dressing. The fabric pattern is incredible. The color combination is very attractive. The material is a polyester chiffon print. The attached underlining is made from a nude chiffon. I was afraid that it would be see-through since both fabrics are so sheer, but that wasn't the case. Its just perfect. The seams are strong and straight. This is a very well made garment. Fabric care recommends dry clean only but since its polyester, I feel certain you can hand wash with a woolite like product and have good results. I simply love this dress. Its carefree styling is effortless and beautiful. I am looking forward to wearing this dress for many years to come. FINEJO Women Chiffon Round Neck Sleeveless Maxi Dress, Green M
summary: Beautiful Boho Chic dress...perfect for summer

reviewText: I really like this dress; I'm just too fat to wear it. (It's the sad truth) I got this dress for free in exchange for my honest review, so here's what I think. The dress is made of really high quality material. It's not thin or see through like I thought it might be. The dress is constructed very well. Seems are tight and straight. The different colored sections of the dress are sewn together very well. It's very solid construction. The dress is easy enough to get on, it just slips over your head. I wear a size 18 right now, and ordered an XXL. It was VERY form fitting and too tight on my chest. I think the XXL would be better suited to someone who wears a 14/16. I liked the length of the dress and the cap sleeves. I felt like they keep the dress modest, but it's still highly fashionable. I really hope after I lose some weight I can wear this dress!

reviewText: I really like this dress. When it came in I thought it looked like it was going to be way too small. I wear a size 16 or an XL, but the size chart said to order an XXL for a size 16. It comes folded in a clear plastic bag. When I unfolded it I though "Oh no" way to small, but it fit perfectly. it is form fitting like the photo. The material is a thinner spandex material so be careful what undergarments you wear under it. I recommend spanx because it a thinner more form fitting dress. It does show the imperfections. It looked wonderful with the spanx on. However, I work black and you could see the line of the underwear part underneath the skirt spanx. So, maybe just a skirt option. I'll have to do a work around on that one. Another part I did not really like is the portion that covers the bust area. It is double layered . It has a V-neck dress underneath a wrap around portion that goes from the right to left. It causes the flaps on the sides of the breast. that stick out. I tried different ways to get rid of them but they are still there. You can fold in the left side under the flap but the right side will always stick out so it looks funny. I left both out so it would be uniform. No one noticed or at least they did not say anything when I wore it. Maybe I am just to self conscious of my appearance. Actually, I just looked at the photo and it shows the bottom folds under the breast out the side so maybe I just wore it wrong. I'll have to try that again later. So besides that great dress. The color is amazing. I absolutely love it. I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend it to others, especially now that I know how it should be worn. I purchased this dress at a discounted price to give my honest review and this is my honest review of this dress.

The bottoms feel nice and comfortable it felt like I wasn't wearing any! The top does not includes any pads inside, so if you like pads you can always use some of your own since there are little slits that you can place your own pads in if that is what you like. I will still wear this bikini because it looks good on me still. I chose the black color and the other color options you can choose from are white, black and a rose red color which looks like pink to me in the picture description. The material used for this bikini feels a little thin but it isn't once you put it on it fits nicely. I like that you can adjust the size you need since the top and bottom have those ties that you can adjust to whatever you like. I really like this swimsuit and definitely recommend it! Pros -ties in back (top) ties on side (bottom) -comes in black, white, rose red -sizes small, medium, large and XL -simple design -has mesh on the inner crotch part and inner breast part -fits as expected NO CONS *Disclaimer I received this bikini at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion!
summary: The perfect black bikini for summer!

reviewText: I read many reviews before purchasing this item, as well as viewing other vendors' products first... Usually, I am a medium across the board or a small if the sizes run bigger. My only option was to purchase a Large in this product. I was anticipating it to fit either slightly loose or perfect, judging from reviews that said to buy a size up. When I first opened the package, the suit looked pretty big just holding it up. However, once I actually tried it on, it does fit slightly snug. The issue is more so that the suit doesn't seem to be long enough to stretch the length of my torso - which is a rather small length. It tends to be tight on my shoulders; the material doesn't give much room to stretch and the shoulder straps are also positioned weird, but it looks exactly as I expected, so I have no complaints. I can stand up straight and be 95% comfortable walking around in it, but I do definitely advise buying a size larger than what you would generally wear. Hope this review helps!

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

It is almost summer and my wife needed some new beach wear. I enjoy buying clothes for her, so I purchased this beautiful black Petrel woman's fashion bikini cover-up tunic to wear around our backyard swimming pool and patio. The polyester is soft to the touch, but still pretty durable. I expect this will take the wear and tear of the beach and still last a long time. My wife is 5 foot 10 and slender. The large size fit her perfectly with the bottom hem just below where a bathing suit would end on her things. The material is transclusent, but it still provides a good deal of cover-up due to the dark black color.  I expect the lighter colors would be much more see-through. The decorative material is quite attractive without being distracting or otherwise standing out too much. This would be perfect for boating, the beach, a luau, evening by the firepit or going to the pool. It seems to me that this item runs somewhat slim for a cover-up.  My wife is slender and it fits her perfectly, but may run slim in the waist and hips for some women. The large fit my 5 foot 10 wife just fine. I received a small discount in exchange for a fair and unbiased review of this product. I recommend the product as it is a very nice oversized chiffon stripe beach swimwear cover up. This cover up is transparent so I don't know how much sun protection it is going to give you. It has shoulder seams on top and is completely closed on the sides (unlike some cover-ups that are more like panchos). Other reviews indicated that it comes down to mid-thigh when standing up, but that is likely for average height women. Thus, I think you can judge that it will be long to long-enough on most American women. Bottom line is that it looks lovely and it is better than average quality for a very nice price. I received this item at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. This is so nice that I plan to buy one of the other colors as well. My wife love it. Thank you for reading my review.
summary: Lovely design; looks great; good value.

Its not to hard to find your perfect size, When figuring out the size of shapewear that is right for you, use your dress size as your guide. It's important to remember that going down a size will actually cause more bulging and discomfort and the waist can roll up or constrict the stomach area. If you are currently between sizes remember to never size down  but order a size up.

The bag arrived yesterday but has such a strong chemical odor that it can't be used unless the odor can be eliminated.  It can't go in the washing machine because there seems to be a piece of cardboard in the bottom between two pieces of vinyl.

If the chemical smell can be eliminated, it's a nice size.  I bought it not for a beach bag but to use to hold knitting and sewing supplies.  The way it is, it can't be used because everything would pick up the odor.

This has happened before with another produce I purchased made in China, and it's the same very strong chemical odor, not the normal odor of vinyl.  I couldn't get rid of the odor in the other item, a purse. and had to throw the purse away but not before it ruined my wallet and eye glass case.  The odor even got on the money in the wallet.  I would not recommend this product unless the chemical smell doesn't matter to you.

It requires a strapless bra to be worn. The dress itself is a basic, cotton knit dress. It flows nicely and hangs well. The quality is in the mid range. There were a few loose threads, but the seams are good.

This dress is awesome! It's the perfect flattering simple summer dress that I was looking for. It arrived after a very quick delivery, in excellent condition. The fabric is light and soft, but not see through and as the style does not hug the body very tightly, I don't need to wear a slip under it. It's very stretchy, so the L fit me perfectly (I wear a size 14 in dresses), in fact I could have probably gone a size down, so if you're in between sizes, I suggest ordering a size down. The dress has a low v-neck, so you can't wear all kinds of bras with it, unless you're OK with the bra showing a little. In summer I actually hate wearing bras, so it's perfect this way for me. Overall, it's a very versatile and super comfortable dress that can be dressed up or down, as you see fit.
The only "issue" I can think of is that the adjustable straps have white little plastic pieces, which is kind of weird for a black dress and it would have probably been better to use darker colored ones. It's not something that would make me give 4 stars instead of 5 though, it's really just a minor detail.

It disguised just enough of my "kangaroo pouch" post partum stomach and most importantly the vneck had enough stretch for me to easily nurse my two week old newborn, the main reason I bought the dress. Some other dresses I tried on had no give in the vneck making it impossible to nurse a newborn. The material is incredibly soft, like a jersey knit, feeling very comfortable against my body (and again, comfortable against baby's skin when he is nursing). It's summer and it is even lightweight enough to keep cool when it is hot outside, even for a black dress. The sleeves are flattering and the length is perfect as well. I'm very happy with this dress and plan on purchasing another for the summer months.

reviewText: Stunning earrings!  My new favorite pair!!

I wasn't sure about this one when I first put it on, but warmed up to it as the day went on.  I selected this top as I wanted something more dressy than a standard t-shirt, something appropriate for work and church.  The material is very nice, has a silky touch to it.  I bought the shirt in red, which is more of an orangy red which if fine for my needs.

I have worn other banded bottom shirts and thought this would fit the same.  It does not.  I like that the bottom is banded, as it helps prevent the top from riding up but the blouson effect is only on the very front part of the abdomen which I find to be odd and wasn't what I expected.  The neckline is a nice shape, not a crew but not anywhere near low enough to have to worry about it.  The shirring is a nice touch and is flattering overall although I found it bunched a bit near my armpits and I had to adjust it down.  Note that the shirring is only on the front, the back is flat and somewhat clingy.  For as loose as the shirt's front is, the sleeves are rather tight.  The material does have some give to it wasn't uncomfortable, just the exact opposite of the rest of the shirt.  I don't know that it would be comfortable on someone with larger upper arms.

Overall I am happy with my purchase and think this top will work its way into a regular rotation in my closet.  I did purchase at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review.  All thoughts and opinions are my own.
summary: Satisfied overall, nice neckline and flattering front.

reviewText:
Really pretty bracelet. Beads are smooth and uniformly sized. But be warned it definitely runs on the small size. I have a slight frame and thin wrists, so works for me but can see how it would be uncomfortable for someone with even an average build.

I love this bracelet. I wanted to try a moonstone bracelet because they appeal to me. I was told by a friend to wear what feels right on me when it comes to natural stone and gemstones, not just birthstone. I was browsing 7th Element's selection, then I saw the grey moonstone. Moonstone was named so because it was thought to have captured the light of the moon in it. Not all of the beads have this moon-like light, but enough do to make the bracelet eye catching. I took a picture outdoors. The blue cast in the photo is from the "moonlight" in the bead that you can see indoors or outdoors.

It is a perfect fit and well-made with multiple strands. I know how to make jewelry myself for a hobby but have not mastered elastic cord beading yet. This elastic is different than what I have seen and the multiple strands make me feel more confident I won't have issues with breakage.

I plan on buying a few more bracelets from 7th Element. I initially chose to buy from them due to the great reviews and their prices are reasonable. The bracelet arrived right away and was packaged very nicely. The pouch that the beads are in is drawstring and has a very soft, faux fur in it that prevents the beads from scratching or damage. The pouch sits inside gift box. I took a picture for your reference.

I highly recommend these bracelets and 7th Element!
summary: Great quality! Planning on buying more! See photos!

reviewText:
Okay, first off, this swimsuit is awesome for women on the curvy side, BUT it will require some minor altering.
1st (and most important) alter: You will have to reinforceme the boob fabric to the shoulder fabric. All you'll need is a sewing needle and a very basic knowledge of sewing. Just add a few extra stitches to each side of the suit. This will ensure your ladies are a little bit more secure and don't go anywhere - picture included.
2nd alter: The padding that is included with this suit... looks like the lady it was modeled off of had grapefruits for boobs. Simply remove the padding and cut each to resemble a more teardrop shape- picture included. OR!! If you got 'em, you won't need the pads at all.
Otherwise, the underwire is a little funky, and might take some adjusting. Eitherway, its a very nice & attractive looking suit for a curvier woman. I bought two, and plan on keeping both.
summary: Minor adjustments, still a great suit!

Ordered this according to the measurement chart they provided but found that it was too short for my torso. With the measurements they don't include the length of the whole swim suit just your waist, bust and maybe hips. If I tried to pull the swim suit up to the proper placement for my chest the leg openings of the swim suit came up to above my hips. It looked ridiculous! I don't consider myself to have a long torso somethings fit and somethings don't. But when trying to wear the swim suit the built in cups were either a few inches above my belly button or the leg openinsg were up above my hips. Nothing like what was pictured. With that being said the swim suit came with a cute draw string bag and returning was a breeze. Mailed it back and promptly received a refund! Overall I thought the pattern on the suit was cute and wish it would have fit me properly or at the least been more clear on the actual measurements of the garment.

Finally! I literally purchased 10 swimsuits from Tankini's to one pieces trying to find one that fits my chest area without major spillage or having the underwire lay right on top of the boob. I am 5'0 about 167 pounds and I have 38DD chest size (They are not a perky 38DD!) This fit my body top like a glove! I ordered two sizes in the pink floral the 50 (16-18) and the 52 (18-20) and both fit but the 16-18 fit the best. I think if you are taller than 5'5 this may not work for you. Like other reviewers said if you have a larger chest the cups are ridiculous but you can easily take them out.
The material and the fabric are well constructed for the price. I am taking this swimsuit to Hawaii and I wanted something that was stylish but also something I could be active be in without worrying about falling out all over the place.  Happy I found this in time!
summary: Great fit for a larger chest!

What woman doesnt love a nice pair of pantyhose? A nice silky pair of stockings, that feels so soft and sexy while wearing them. The Open Crotch Sexy Silk Stocking Lace Socks, Pantyhose Sexy Thigh High Crotch-less, by Augymer, arrived on time, packaged for protection.
This pair of stocking is black and very much crotch-less. When I first opened the package I was a bit shocked, because I wondered what would be harder getting them on the first time, or trying to convince myself that its OK to wear these outside of the bedroom. Now being a Big girl like myself, these look extremely small compared to what I would normally wear. They did not look like they would fit anyone over the age of 5 much less some in the double digits. Still I tried them on, I did manage to get them on and positioned right so that my legs were covered, the waist was where it should be, and of course my female area was completely open. Now Im a female who trust her husband and his opinion, so once I had put on a dress and some shoes I walked out to the living room to see what he thought. Nice was his reply, not exactly what I was looking for but it would work. Now me know the kids are outside with friends, I turned to walk away, but as I did I lifted the dress and kept going. YES, he did follow because he could not believe his eyes, or the fact that I had actually put something like that on me. The opinion changed quickly from Nice to Sexy, and a few other words I will keep in my bedroom. Needless to say I do like these, they fit nicely, they feel wonderful while wearing them. They do have a silky soft feeling. These could be worn for very day wear, or a special evening in with your better half. I suggest the latter, but thats a call youll have to make for yourself.

 I received this product at a reduced price for a fair, honest and unbiased review.

When you have been with the same person over 25 years you don't want things to get boring. We experiment in various things such as role play, toys, and sexy dress. I purchased these for a dinner alone which does not happen that often.

I did not tell him about them and wore a short skirt. This also does not happen often as with six children going out is hard enough, but dressing too is a complete different story.  On the way there I simply grabbed his hand and showed him my new pantyhose. He had a look of something on his face. He wasn't sure what just happened but no longer wanted to go to dinner. Of course I made him and teased him for hours.

Later though let me tell you he did not wait this time to take the pantyhose off. They stayed in tact, did not rip or run. They fit well but were a little smaller then I expected My husband said these are the best pair of hose I have ever bought. He loved him. They made a special night, just that much more special.

Disclaimer: I did receive this item either free or at a discounted price for exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. I am in no way connected to the seller nor am I required to leave a five-star review. I review the item and rate it honestly and fairly. This bathing suit just arrived and I was worried about it being too small coming from China. It surprisingly fits well, but is not made well. It's made with this weird thin but soft material that isn't really bathing suit material (at least, as we know in America.) The bottoms I do like, but the top is just kind of a mess. It's super thin though luckily not see-through (there is padding), and reminds me of a children's swim top. The picture gave me the impression that it would be a sturdy top with an underwire but it's the complete opposite, very floppy and scrunchy with little to no support. It is also more like a typical triangular bikini top in person. The colors are not nearly as vibrant as the picture, it looks very washed out and more white than back. I will probably only wear the bottoms with a different top of my own. Always hoping it looks like the picture but I'm not surprised with the quality at that price I paid,
summary: You get what you pay for.

reviewText: The color really pops out. I really like the shirt. It is very comfortable.
cheap no good

I bought 2 two shirts of different designs from this company. Details about myself: 5'6" 130 lb slim/average build body type. The items fit well and look great. The material is thin and breathable but definitely would be cold if worn in the winter without undershirt. The overall quality is good for the price. Some small stray strands here and there but nothing a few adjustments with a scissor wouldn't fix.

Packaging was good too. wrapped in a bag + plastic outer so there was no issues with shipping.

I am looking to buy more from this company.

Fit
Not very slim fit, slight taper, but strangely, mostly below the waist line so it will not show when tucked in.  I am slender and V-shaped, basically like the mannequin, and the shirt does not fit as pictured.  It fits slightly tighter in the chest than pictured, but the rest below the chest is baggy and loose, and a bit short.  The mannequin pictured must have the shirt pulled back and pinned.

Comfort
Very thin fabric, yet very stiff.  I have sensitive skin, and I can feel the fabric prickling my skin.

Style
Definitely looks a lot worse in actuality and upon closer inspection it looks like I am wearing polka dots. Very thin fabric makes the white somewhat see-through, which is common in many shirts, but in this case, the fake lapel pocket is made so cheaply, they use a not-so-neatly-cut strip of fabric larger than the black on the front, so basically you see a strange block showing through from behind the fake pocket opening.  The collar is thin and soft, it will not keep shape--no idea how the pictured collar could stay like that--it basically lays flat with deep misshapen wrinkles on the one I received.
summary: Baggy at waist, poor quality, disappointing look

reviewText:
So many issues here and they've all been mentioned in these reviews before.  Sadly, I'm now just a cautionary tale of someone who should have heeded their advise and used my money to instead buy a marker and white T-shirt to just draw my own shirt.  As ridiculous as that would have looked, it would still have been better than the product that arrived at my door.  I purchased this shirt as part of a costume but I won't be able to wear it and it's too expensive to ship it back to China.  The laundry list of the "bad" is as follows:
1.  They run small - I knew that and ordered a size too big but it still didn't fit because they don't run small, they run WAY small.  My son wears a men's Medium and the XL I ordered fits him.
2.  As many have mentioned, there must be something wrong with the way the vendor enlarges the picture for larger sized shirts.  This causes the nipples to be practically under your armpits.  The front view is basically just flesh colored and doesn't really make sense to others until you lift your arm and they say, "Hey, what's your nipple doing there?"
3. The shipping window is about a month, so order with plenty of time if you decide to throw caution to the wind and order this anyway.  And please note that when you too decide that this item is a great idea with incredibly poor execution that you as well will be screwed because you can't ship this back to China and get a refund - although this shirt is so disappointing I'm actually considering paying them to take it back from me.
Ok, enough said, I've got to go buy a marker and T-shirt now.
Beautiful.. great quality

Nope. I ordered an XXL, thinking I'd rather have it need altered than have it too small. Welp. I have a 39 inch bust, and I can't zip it. The zipper doesn't even touch. Also, the top is completely see-through. No material at all, there, except for the chiffon. It COULD be a great dress, it is pretty. Mine is just absolutely not sized correctly, and I don't like walking out with my chest on display. Especially at a military function... pretty awful. Also the inside slip, that's only on the bottom, is extremely short. Hits just under my bottom. Very disappointed in this dress. Even more so, because it has huge potential.

Edit:after contacting the company about this poorly made dress, they refused to give me a refund, claiming that they paid for shipping so they'd refund half of my money, and to sell it or give it to a friend. The issue with this, is its UN-WEARABLE no one can wear this dress... unless they want their lady bits hanging out. I've bought other clothing from LXS that was really nice, but after my experience with their company, I won't be buying from them again. It's not in any way my fault that they give free shipping, or that the dress wasn't made properly. So I paid half price for a dress that is useless, because of their mistake. Bad customer service deserves commenting on.
summary: It COULD be a great dress, it is pretty

Fit (Color:Green)
Length: I'm 5'8", and this was perfect so that my feet peeked out at the bottom.  Perfect for flats or low-heeled boots, not sure if it would look awkward with tall heels on me.
Waist: My waist is somewhere around 29" give or take on any given day, and this fit comfortably.  I can get it up over my bum with some coaxing, but prefer to put it on over my head since it does fit snugly.
Weight: On the lighter side (compared to one or two other brands I ordered), but perfect for warmer weather.

Although the name sounds Italian, the product is made in China.

Material: The leather is ok quality, but I'm a quality freak and it doesn't appear to be in the same league as an Italian or American leather. The leather finish just didn't look or feel like top grain soft leather. The sewing is ok and the zipper works. The rings and chain were rust free. I've seen complaints about poor quality hardware on other pockets, this was not the case here. The lining is ok and is as appears in the pictures.

Presentation: The packaging is top notch. I showed it to a friend and she said wow that's beautiful.

Bottom Line:
Ultimately, I returned the product because it didn't fit my needs. The price is great for the item. However, in the end, I wanted something that was smaller, thinner, and with a better leather. My primary usage for this pocket is house keys. I think the lining would have held up well to protect the leather from the keys, which is a definite plus. However pocket-ability which is important to me for this item was the ultimate determining factor.
summary: The leather finish just didn't look or feel like top grain soft leather

reviewText: Good quality and constructed expertly. Royal blue color is beautiful.

I ordered the largest size available for the scoop necked dolman sleeved top, an XL, in the color fuschia. It arrived much smaller than I thought it would be and most of the time these type of shirts are way too big and you can size down one to two sizes and still be comfortable in them. Not this one...it looks small when you hold it up to yourself and when you put it on, you realize the very top of it fits well, but the bottom of this shirt is pretty tight and not very long either. It does look very much like the photo description and it is indeed made from the material stated, 95% rayon and 5% spandex, but it is does not feel quite the same as other clothing I have purchased made from this material. I am not unhappy with it at all and I will wear it. I just wanted to let other people know what to expect when they order these tops. The color is bright and true, exactly what you order, not off because of the screen or monitor, etc. The fit is much smaller than I imagined when I ordered this top and I would say it is almost US junior sizing. It is not way too small, just more fitted than you would think for this type of top. I can't stress that enough. I do like it and it is incredibly stretchy material so just because it is a little smaller doesn't mean it will not fit. My measurements are as follows for comparison: 43' bust or 38D/ 35" waist/ 44" hips...I'm 5'7" AND 199 lbs. I ordered an XL and that is my usual size in tops.
I received a discount on this shirt in exchange for my honest opinion and review of the product. I hope you have found my review helpful. Thank you!
summary: Lots of Colors to Choose From...A Little Tighter at the Bottom than Expected

I'm pretty disappointed though because the shirt is really cute and Gabby is really big into the descendants right now, and it is hard enough to actually find their stuff right now. It also sucks that there is only 2 size options for this shirt as well, and the  is the biggest one. I would say size up if you decide to buy this and they are smaller than a size , and if they are between sizes or wear around a  size then don't buy it because it will probably be too small. The shirt overall is very cute, and the design is a pretty shiny silver color. They just need to get their sizes more accurate and more options to choose from. I think I'm going to stay away from Disney store clothes from now on unless we are able to try it on first.

My husband is an average size man  and this shirt doesn't line up quite right on him so I definitely don't recommend this shirt for someone that's smaller or larger than average. I don't think this shirt was measured well or tried on an average size man when measurements were made  or something. If everything lined up correctly this shirt would be hilarious and very realistic!
summary: Shirt would be great but it's not measured well.

reviewText:
This tunic top is perfect for busty girls who like form-fitting tops! Show off those curves while keeping it classy. I'm usually a medium in PattyBoutik (small in many other brands) and in medium, this fits as expected.

Be aware, if you aren't super skinny like, say, a model, this will not drape as loosely on you as it does on the model in the picture. It hugs the bod and doesn't hide much. That said, it's not super thin and slinky material -- quite the opposite, it's slightly structured and very stretchy, so you don't have to be in perfect shape for this to be cute on you. But it will show your hips and your belly curve, and you will probably see the shape of the waistband of your leggings underneath.

If you aren't at least, I'd guess, a C-cup, this will probably fit weird. I'm a D-cup, and I love it! Slim fit to show off the figure, while presenting a pretty decolletage. It's tunic length, so you can wear it with leggings or yoga pants. Since the top is so fitted, I think it looks great with loose, flowy pants.

Returned.  The neckline was too long and I don't mind that, if it was cut differently and better quality.  The hemming of this shirt makes it look cheaper.  Bummed because I wanted it to work but not for the cost,

summary: Great top, shoulder straps are a little long, resulting in loose straps

I love the color of this dress, it's exactly the blue I wanted. I shopped a very long time to find something that has some sparkle and will fit my shape. I'm carrying extra weight after my baby and need some help with the tummy. This dress offered a chance to do that and still be fun. I'm 5'4", so the skirt is going to be hemmed, but that's to be expected with any formal dress for me.

The pleats on the bodice are nicely sewn, no bunching or lumps, all the seams are finished, and I would say for the price the construction is very good. The hem on the sheer outer skirt is not going to be hard to shorten, but the lining material is sewn so the seam is hidden. It's going to be a little trickier to hem.

The dress lost a star due to the cluster of sequins not being level with the waist line. It's not as noticeable when it's on and I'm moving around, but on the hanger it's definitely askew.

The fit is comfortable, right now I wear a 14 pant and ordered the 18. The laces only show a little, so I could probably have ordered the 16. I was just being conservative with my baby fat :-). Lacing it on your own can be done, the material is slick enough that with some patience you can get it together.

reviewText: I love these and they're my go to neutral earrings now!
Item is casual chic love them.

I purchased these Cos2be Textured Twisted Oval Hoops Dangle Earrings, and love them! The pictures really don't do them any justice. They are really elegant and pretty, and will dress up any outfit. They are very lightweight earrings, even for being over two inches long. I was really impressed. I have very sensitive ears, and if the metal is too cheap, they'll start turning red and itching. I have worn these for 4 hours and now itching or tenderness. They came packaged in a nice little jewelry box, which would be great for anyone that wanted to give these as a gift. But me me, these are my gift to me. Even though these were in a solid little jewelry box, they then came in the standard Amazon box. The earrings and jewelry box were in excellent condition and I got my earrings within two days. Thank you Amazon Prime!

Despite receiving the sellers discounted price for this item, I rate the product as if purchased for full retail and with the same degree of scrutiny. I personally rely heavily on other customers reviews when making a purchase on Amazon and I take writing my own reviews very seriously. I take the honest and unbiased aspect of all of my reviews very seriously. I don't hesitate to write a critical review or rate items low when warranted. All opinions and words are 100% my own. I was not required to write a positive review in exchange. If anything changes with my feelings or opinion on the product I will update my review with appropriate information.  If this review was helpful to you, please let me know by clicking the YES button below so I can continue to improve my reviews.
summary: Very nice set of Earrings for any occasion!

reviewText: These earrings came packaged well in a sturdy jewelry box. They are light weight,  which is wonderful for wearing for extended hours. They are longer than I anticipated,  but that is merely preference. They are music to my ears--in other words, they make a bit of noise because of their design. They look elegant and polished and will coordinate well with many outfits.

Cos2be Silver Plated Textured Twisted Oval Hoops Dangling Earrings (Leaf Twisted Hoops-Silver) These are decent quality earrings, especially for fashion/costume jewelry and being silver-plated. Frankly, would be difficult to tell. Not cheap looking or feeling at all. Great buy especially for the list price. I've bought earrings that were of much less quality but pricier than these. These are pretty yet simplistic, very versatile. Would look great dressed up or down, from wearing with jeans to wearing to work, to wearing to dinner or a night out. Not too big but eye-catching enough. Very pleased with this buy, and highly recommend! Disclaimer: I purchased these earrings at a discount from the seller, in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.
summary: Pretty, yet simplistic and versatile, great quality for the price too!

reviewText:

They look sturdy and set that you won't have to worry that the stones would break or something. The chain is a decent length of 18 inches. It is why I gave it a 4 star instead of a 5 star But all in all, it is a cute jewelry, but I would suggest to take it off while showering or in the pool or even exercising because they are not made for that. *Disclaimer : I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. This is a gorgeous cross. My family loves crosses and my daughter and I fought for this one as I was the last recipient. The cross is almost 1.5" inches long and the chain is a great 18 inches.

The lobster claw clasp is perfect fitting into a small jump ring.

The cross itself is made up of 10 Cubic Zirconia with another in the center of the cross for a total of 11 round Cubic Zirconias.

So far so good. No irritation or discoloration and the price is incredible.

This is a very pretty cross design. I would call the pendant medium sized. The cross is about 1.4 inches long. I like this size because it is not too small. The cross has little tiny crystals on it. Look closely because each round section is not just a big crystal. Half the circle is actually metal and in the center is the tiny crystal. It gives the illusion of larger crystals. I thought that was neat. The end effect is a shiny and brilliant looking front to the cross. The back of the cross is just the plain metal. The loop on top of the cross that holds it to the chain is closed. That is great so you won't loose the pendant. The included chain is about 18 inches long. It is a thin chain so it won't take too much rough tugging. It should be OK for normal use though. I like the sturdy large Lobster clasp. This is made with an alloy metal. It is a very shiny and bright Silver tone color. I make sure not to get it wet or in contact with any sweat or chemicals so it will last looking good for longer. I don't have any metal allergies so I have no problems with alloy metals. But keep that in mind if you do have metal allergies or history of turning metals green. So far so good. Beautiful cross design and nicely made necklace. Just as described. *****DISCLOSURE: I received this item free of charge to evaluate and review. All opinions are my own.

I received the Women's Short Sleeve V-Neck Pleated Beach Mini Tunic Dress free for my review. As a fashion blogger I am always looking for affordable stylish clothing to introduce my readers to. I love style but I myself am on a budget so I need fashion that is easily converted from one look to another. This tunic is perfect for so many looks - you can layer it with a cardigan which I have a few times, you can also tie it up with a scarf, belt it, or wear it loose. It is perfect for hiding an imperfect figure especially belly weight!
In my photos I show a day to night transition - day time on top wearing with jeans and the top is just loosely hanging which is nice but then you can amp the look up for nighttime with a scarf tied around the middle and some added jewelry to give a WOW look!
You can truly wear this from day to play, office to night on the town!
I own several tops from Timeson and all are well made, quality fabrics, and fit well - I even have quite large upper arms and I do not feel as if they are over exposed. If you have added weight in your belly this top especially will hide that. I love that it comes in a lot of nice colors too.
The pleating is super well done which gives the top an added flair of excitement!
This top can be worn with boots, heels, flats, even combat boots as I wore in my photos. Truly one of those pieces you will reach for often because you can totally change up your look. I love tops that allow me to do that. When you are on a budget and need clothing that can stretch the limits of your wardrobe it sure helps to have things like this.
The sizing chart is a little confusing but I am five foot three inches I weight about 140 to 145 depending on the time of the month, I have a 38 DD chest and larger upper arms - the large fits me perfectly.
summary: So easy to transition from day to play! Great quality!
