The idea of the product is very useful and I was very much looking forward to it. However, I think I received a defective unit. Upon receipt:

Pros:
1. the magnet works
2. the light lights up in various levels as advertised
3. useful intention/idea
4. shipped fast

Cons:
1. safety concern: scary, loud, buzzing noise as if it could explode any time during usage. Louder as time of keeping the light lit increases, and as number of usage increases.
2. defective USB/microUSB connector port: badly manufactured ports that have the metal parts disconnected and sticking part very slanted. This makes the cord impossible/hard to fit and function properly.
3. defective battery: didn't charge after 24 hours of charging, even though advertised to be max 4 hours.
4. annoying battery light indicator: Battery indicator light comes up randomly and no instruction on how to turn this indicator light on when you need it or off when it comes up bright randomly in the middle of the night.
5. manual in machine-translated English, which could wasn't a huge problem to me in comparison to safety concerns, but is a cons after all.

Again, it is a product of very useful idea and intention, and I'd love to use it if it were safe and functioning, but I think any product with a safety concern I can't give it more stars than 1 or 2.

so.

it is what it is.

I'd give it a 1 star for its safety concern but hey, maybe it was just a defective unit out of many functioning ones, maybe I was just unlucky enough to stumble on one that slipped through their quality contron procedure. So might as well give the small company some chance and not leave them the worst feedback possible I guess.

Below are just some more detailed elaboration on the cons listed above:

1. The metal parts were not fused properly: the metal sheets were not even touching each other, making the ports useless and cannot function properly. The USB connector and the microUSB heads won't be able to fit in properly. The flat part in the middle of the port that goes into the USB head also wasn't straight, making it even harder to connect the cord without further damaging both the unit and the cord.

2. This was the part that I was really not okay about and the main reason why I decided to start a return. Unit makes a really loud and scary buzzing noise when lit. Even at the weakest lighting level, it makes that noise as if it could explode any time. This is also part of the reason why I think I received a defective unit. Or, if all units do this, then it could be a design flaw.

3. The unit never charges completely. I was charging it for >24 hours and the charging light remains red. While it is advertised (on the manual) to charge fully within 4 hours.

4. The unit also lights up very, very randomly. I understand the blue light is to indicate the battery status of the unit, but it is a very bright blue light that lights up at the weirdest moments every other minutes. It looks like if you pick it up or change its direction after a long sitting, the bright blue light will come up. Sometimes it just randomly comes up while I hold it in my hand. But when I try to replicate any of that, I cannot just make the blue light come up again either. I have no idea what triggers it and all it says on the manual is how to read that blue light to find out its battery status. I've read the manual many times and even the embedded every once-so-often machine-translated parts where it isn't very readable, no key words related to how to start the process of battery reading was mentioned so I'm pretty sure it's not in there.

5. about 30% of the manual is machine-translated English, this one didn't matter as much to me in terms of knocking out stars or not since it was just a flashlight and most of the operation was pretty straight forward, but it is a cons.

This little LED emergency light is awesome. The battery lasts a very long time, I still have not even ever charged it, and my kids keep playing with it, and Ive used it  and everything. I am now keeping mine in my car so that I will have it if I ever break down.  There are so many different uses for this little device. I like that the flashlight is so bright, and its an LED light. There are 3 different brightnesses that you can use. Also there is a red flashing light that you can set it to for an emergency. It also serves as a power bank, therefore if your phone (or other device) goes dead you can charge it with this emergency flashlight. I have been and will continue to recommend this product to others because it could literally be a lifesaver, especially the way things are in the world today. I want my mom to get one, I think that it would be a good thing for her to keep in the car also. She got lost in the dark on the way home the other night.

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. All thoughts and opinions provided here are my own formed during my evaluation of this product. I just want to help consumers in knowing which products work and which ones do not, I do not get paid to write any reviews.
summary: Very handy little device. I am happy to keep this in my car in case of emergency. I had no idea it also can charge your phone.

reviewText: This portable emergency LED lamp/flashlight is a must have and I'm not just saying that. Emergencies happen all the time, whether on the road or even sitting at home, losing power and having no backup light just leaves us stumbling around in the dark. I have lost power at home due to severe weather and only had candles as a backup light, having to carry one from room to room causes wax to drip and nobody wants wax hardening on their carpet not to mention accidental burns which I have done. The Pomer Portable Mini LED Flashlight/Lamp is compact, fits easily into a vehicle's glove compartment or even a purse. It has four settings with the fourth being an S.O.S. It is magnetized so it fits onto the top of you vehicle if you should breakdown so that other drivers can see you. This is not the only safety feature though. This would be good for the college student that has to walk campus at night. As a mother to 20 somethings there is an innate fear of what can happen and my university student having this light with the at night lessens that fear, not only can she see better but others can also see her. This also is good for the night time jogger or bicyclist. Being seen and being able to see is what I really like about this product. Like I always tell my children.. Safety first. - I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

So the first thing my husband said when I opened the package was  did you order a doilie? With that said, I must say the photo looks like its really elegant lace all around, but in reality it does look like a big ol doily with big white holes. Regardless, I still like the shirt! The cold shoulder look is not only in, but also super cute. I went with the reddish color and it is exactly as pictured  very deep red and very rich color. It will look hot with skinny jeans, peek toe boots, and some red lipstick. The white part makes it so you really don't need a necklace, though a choker and small studs would really complete the look. I love it! I do wish it were a little longer though. Its a very soft material and kind of flowy, meaning it is not form fitting, which is good for online purchases. I'm fairly satisfied with my purchase of this top. The product arrived on time and nicely packaged. The plastic wrap that this was in was like that of a big Ziploc bag, with the sealing zipper at the top - I thought that was pretty nice.

I tried on this top and the sleeve length is a bit too long for my arms. If I left the sleeves untouched, they would fall past my hands. However the top fit me very nicely, a bit tight at the armpits but that's just me being too knit picky.

I hand washed the shirt and let it surf dry overnight. I noticed that while I was rinsing and squeezing water out of the shirt a tint of red water came out as well, so I would be a bit careful if you were to machine wash it with other clothes.

The shirt did not come laced up, I had to lace the string through myself which wasn't really a big deal. However I think the open top part, like the breast area, was a bit loose on me. It might have been because I didn't tie/lace the shirt properly before trying it on, but when I went to the sink to wash my hands I had to bend a little and the chest area flap was completely loose, showing visible cleavage.

But overall, this is a pretty good top to have. It was not sheer at all and the fabric is better than I thought it would be. I would recommend getting this top. I got this in a size medium, for reference I'm 5'1", 34 B, and around 111 lbs.
summary: Perfect for spring or summer, or when you're going out

reviewText:
If this shirt looked and fit exactly like the picture then this would've been a five star review. If the shipping wasn't so fast, this would've been a three star review. As you can see there are pros and cons with this purchase.

First, let's begin with the fact that I ordered a small. I'm actually a true to size small so this shirt came and fit a little too loose on me which I didn't like. However this can be a good thing if you rock it with something high waisted. Next, let's discuss how the concept of the shirt was there but then it wasn't. I love how it actually came cropped with the thing around the neck. However what threw me off was the tag that is normally on the back of the shirt that was sewn in the front. Then, let's talk about the material. It was on the thinner side which I normally wouldn't mind if everything else was fine which in this case it isn't.

For this company, I would recommend, taking the tag off from the front. I would also recommend, making the shirt tighter but with stretchy material. This shirt had a ton of potential but it just wasn't met for me.

P.S. I purchased this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

The tag was sewn on on the front side... there were loose threads everywhere. I'm extremely disappointed. In my opinion, this runs large. I ordered a small and it fit more like a medium. It didn't fit anything like the model in the picture. It didn't cling to my body at all, just kind of hung there awkwardly. The neck piece looks like it could rip off at any moment because it was poorly attached. It's a cute concept that would make any girl look bad-ass but it was so terribly executed. The only good thing I could say is that the shipping didn't take as long as I thought it would. It's  not worth returning this item, so I guess I'm stuck with it.*

*I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

There is also a tie in the back that I think is really cute! I think this dress would be perfect for many different occasions! I would definitely recommend this LECIMO Vintage 1950's Women's Dress!

reviewText: Great watch

This is a really good-looking watch suitable for both casual or
dress wear.  I love the fact that it has a mechanical movement,
thus eliminating the need for battery changes; it keeps good
time and has a power reserve of approximately 52 hours.  I
changed the band to a matching rose gold expansion band that
matches the case, hands, and stick markers.  The thin bezel,
second sub-dial, and onion crown remind me of watches made
in the 50's and 60's.  If you're looking for a hand-wind watch at
a bargain price, buy this one; you won't be sorry.

This shoulder bag from Crest Designs is the best combination of style and function. I ordered the pink one (there wasn't a yellow option so I went with my other favorite color). This is a great nylon fabric that is a really nice quality and very durable. It has a lot of pockets, and is perfect for keeping all of your items organized. There is also an interior padded pocket that is perfect to carry a tablet or compact laptop. I own a cosmetics business, so I always need to carry products, catalogs and supplies and this bag is a great way to bring everything with me on the go! There are short straps so you can use it as a handbag, as well as a removable long strap so you can use it as a messenger bag for hands-free carrying. It also comes with a matching wristlet, so it f you need to take just a few basics (phone, money, keys, lipstick) you're all set! I received this product at a discount in exchange for my 100% honest and unbiased review.
summary: Best combination of style and function!

reviewText:
I purchased this bag in Pink, since that is my favorite color. I needed a bag that I could put my small laptop in for work and Girl Scouts, this is the perfect bag. I have plenty of pockets and divided spaces, so that I have my laptop secure and everything else I normally carry has a place all its own. I love the fact that I can have just the handles or a shoulder strap when I need my hands free to carry other things.  The small pouch is great for change or separating out bills or just smaller papers. I LOVE the material it is easy to clean yet strong an durable. I can replace my regular purse for this and m back pack for my computer, since it all fits into this one space. The fact that they put a 1 year warranty on the bag is reassuring that it I made to last. I am so excited to use this bag and share with friends and family the quality.

This Crest Design Women's Vintage Wash Nylon Bag is fantastic!  I has a TON of pockets and places to store your items. I love all of the different color choices too. They are not your normal bag colors. I also really appreciate the fact that you can carry it like a briefcase using the handles or you can wear it across your body using the crossbody strap. I also like that it is water repellent. This is a must for people with little kids and electronics. I can put our iPad in it and feel it is safer than being out in the open. I plan to use this bag for my school bag and for my carry on travel bag. With this design, the possibly uses are endless. I also love the small wallet that comes with it. The pop of color from the inside of the wallet is great too.

I'd love to order another one but am very hesitant lest there be another issue like that.

reviewText:
I'll start this review by going over sizing, because it can be really frustrating trying to guess what size you'll need. These shirts fit like juniors sizes, so if you wear much more than a small in women's sizes, you're probably not going to get a satisfactory fit (unless you enjoy feeling like an overstuffed sausage). I typically wear either a large in juniors or small in women's, and the medium I ordered initially was just a little bit tighter than I wanted.

The fabric is relatively thin, but soft and stretchy. I think it's going to be great for summer golf. The shirt has a slim fit, so if you like a little room in your shirts, this is probably not for you. It's much more feminine than traditional polo shirts.

My favorite thing about this shirt was the incredibly vibrant color. I'll definitely be buying more in other colors.
summary: Great shirts, but feels like juniors sizing

These are a great pair of inexpensive sunglasses.  After losing my $400 Tom Ford sunglasses last summer, I've given up investing in designer sunglasses.  But there aren't that many inexpensive sunglasses that are both stylish and work well in terms of shading the sun.  These glasses are an exception to that.

I ordered the black colored frame with black lenses.  The black lenses are dark enough to adequately shade my eyes from the sun.  These sunglasses are oversized, which gives them a Jackie O. or old Hollywood type feel.  They look flattering on my face and fit well.  Unlike many inexpensive sunglasses, these sunglasses aren't too loose so they fall off my face or top of my head.  They fit snug but not too tight.  The sunglasses came in a carrying pouch and included a screwdriver glasses tool to tighten the arms if needed.

I like these so much I plan on buying them in the white color.

I bought the dress size XL based on the size chart provided along with the product images. First off, I am 5'2", 140 lbs, with 36B-30-38 in bust-waist-hip. I carry my weight around the midsection.

This dress is made of 65% polyester and 35% cotton according to the tag but I think there is a little bit of spandex in there since it has some stretch. This is a midweight pull-on shift dress with no buttons, zippers, or lining. The feel of the fabric is like a stretchy gym tank top. That being said, I think I could have fit into a medium since there is stretch, provided I wear some control undergarments such as Spanx. The XL was not too big but instead of hugging my body, it skims it with some room to spare. With the XL, I get a little bit of bunching around the small of the back and some flutter around my legs. All in all, with my size and body type, I think I would be most comfortable with the L.

On terms of print and color, I think this is a dress that can be worn all seasons, because while the print has some tropical elements in it, the colors range from blue to purple to black, so it won't look out of place in colder months. The print also camouflages areas that some people might feel conscious about--like their waist and thighs. It is visually lengthening and slimming.

I think this dress is a win because it is forgiving, just pick the right size. It does not wrinkle so it is good to take on a travel. It is comfortable, versatile and easy to wash. Just handwash, roll in a towel to get excess moisture, then hang to dry.

This control top boycut underwear worked perfectly on my post baby body. Having just had a baby, I was not thrilled at how my clothes were fitting me. This control top was comfortable to wear and stayed in place. I was able to give the illusion that everything was back to where it was pre-baby.

The quality of this control top is excellent. The material is thick which makes it quite durable. The down side to the thickness is that it can get rather hot. The fabric feels smooth to the touch and even feels silky. The stitching is excellent. After carefully looking over all seams, I still do not see any rips, tears or fraying anywhere on it. Also, I love the non slip band on the very top of the control top. I have not had to readjust or pull the piece up.

The sizing is correct. I wear a size 6/7 pants size and the medium fit me perfectly. It wasn't so tight that it was uncomfortable, but was tight enough to keep everything in.

Washing did not shrink or damage this either. I washed this in cold water on the delicate setting. Then, I hung it up to dry. Washing it this way did not cause any issues at all.

Overall, I would recommend this. It is made well with quality thick materials. It does get hot in warmer weather, but it does work very well. I rate this 5/5 stars. I did receive this at a discounted or free rate for my honest and unbiased opinion, but all opinions expressed are my own.
summary: Well made and fit as expected

reviewText: I bought this boy short design shaper for my mom who wanted something she could wear under clothes to look skinnier. The boy short design makes it really comfortable, and doesnt rise giving wedges. The fabric is 70% Nylon and 30% Elastane making it very smooth and silky. The high waist of the shorts reach right up to your chest, covering up any fat near the area around your stomach. It helps slim and flatten your body from chest down. When using the body shaper, she noticed that the pouch on her stomach wasn't as noticeable. It accentuates her curves and refines her body. The shorts fit her pretty well and didn't run too small or large. She likes how it hugs a bottom and gives it some lift and shape. The only thing that my mom didn't really like about the shaper was the rubber elastic waist. On the inside of the waistband, there are two rubber strands that goes across the waist line. Whenever wearing the boy shorts for too long, the rubber waist band make her feel itchy and uncomfortable especially if she is sitting for a long period of time. Overall, my mom commentated that she really likes the shorts but wouldnt recommend wearing it for long periods of time. She like to wear it under her dress to firm up for social outings such as church and party. She likes how her friends complimented on how great she keep in such good shape not knowing she is getting a little help from this shapewear. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

This shapewear is very flattering! It drives me crazy when I get shapewear that adds more rolls than it takes away. This shapewear isfirm in the right places and really helps to take away my awful love handles that are definitely my trouble area. When I wear this shapewear, I can actually wear my jeans without feeling like I'm squeezing in! TMI, yes but I really do like it.

I find that this shapewear is firm in the right areas- a very good thing. It supports well through my tummy but i loose enough up on my ribs that I don't get a weird line at the top. I do find with boy shorts that I get a little line under my butt where the legs run, but it doesn't look like an underwear line and isn't really noticable with the jeans on that I can now fit into.

I actually ordered this a size smaller than I measured at for extra support. I found the sizing was true to what I expected and that it still fit well and supported shaping my body. I'm very happy with this hi-waist shapewear!

 I received this shapewear for free for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: Had a Whipple procedure for pancreatic cancer and I have a hernia next to the insision. My doctor wanted me to wear an elastic waist band. I tried a number of different ones and this one is the winner.

I love boyshorts and have been wearing that style for years after having my little ones. It's extremely comfortable and I do not feel like it is always "riding". As soon as I saw this Camellias Women's Shapewear Minimizing Hi-Waist Boyshort, I immediately ordered it. I ordered a size large; but, somehow it went through as a XL. I know this because on the size chart to order, the only available sizes on the pull down menu to order are S, M, and L. This specific Camellias Women's Shapewear Minimizing Hi-Waist Boyshort is a little loose; but, very comfortable. It does not have much tummy and stomach control for me since it is a little loose/large. It does keep my sides "controlled" and it definitely did not bulge over. However, it is very comfortable and comfort is important to me. I have the shapewear brief too I will admit that I truly like both types of cut. I would love it if the manufacturer has a nude shapewear so that I could wear it under my light colored dresses and white pants. Yes, I wore white pants (not leggings) quite a bit before. I would love to do that again.
I am excited to finally own shapewear products so that I can fit in my little dresses again. Of course, I still need to continue to eat well and kickbox; but, at least I can have this for now and as a reinforcement in the future.
I hope this review has been helpful to you and I attached five pictures.
I received this product for my always honest and unbiased review and opinion.

One of my favorite pastimes is partner dancing... and one of my favorite dances is the Argentine Tango. The thing is, I'm somewhat...er...curvy... so the bodycon type dresses I often find are a bit to... revealing...

So Shapewear is my friend.  I find for my particular curves, the boyshort style is best because it blends the area from hip to thigh a lot better fo rme than standard shapewear and I prefer high-waisted for the same reasons.

This shapewear is what I would call a light to moderate control. In other words, you can still breathe in it but that also means that areas like a larger tummy will be controlled, but not completely "tucked" in. I have come to peace with my tummy (for now at least... this is a post-menopausal issue that I'm trying to lose but for now, it is what it is). So I'm not going to try to make it totally disappear.... but as you can see from the photos I'm uploading, these pants have smoothed over a lot of the lumps and bumps in my hips and tummy so that the lines are a lot more appealing in the dress I'm wearing. And for now, that's the best I can hope for ... at least, unless I want to wear a corset or whatever to pull things in more... and I personally prefer to be able to breathe while I dance...LOL....

So - I'm pretty pleased with these. I got an XL size and I'm a full size 12...almost a 14 depending on fit. To be honest, I wonder if I could have gone down a size...but I've found that a lot of these things on Amazon are a size small so I erred on the side of caution. Being so stretchy, if you are on the smaller side of a 12, you may go with a smaller size than I did.

I received this for free in exchange for my time to work with this product so I can write a fair and honest review... however, I only accept review items I need so I can give them a real trial, and thus my opinions and experiences are a real and true reflection of my experience with the product. I have received no compensation and I don't have any kind of personal/business relationship with the seller.  I hope my review helps you in your purchase decisions!
summary: Nice Light to Medium Control Shapewear

My daughter was recently given the opportunity to receive this 3 pack of women's compression tank tops at a discount in exchange for her honest evaluation and review of them. Therefore, this review is based on her opinion of this product. I hope you find it helpful.

For reference, my daughter is 5'6" and weighs about 140lbs. She ordered the blue, black, and rose colored tanks in the US large/Asia XL. She usually wears a medium in tank tops because she likes them to fit a little snug, but because Asia sizes run smaller than US sizes, she ordered a size up.

They arrived looking exactly as they do in the pictures. The colors are very vibrant. They seem to be made well and the stitching is done very nicely.

Unfortunately the first thing she noticed was that they weren't exactly "compression." They are, however, made with spandex so they have a lot of stretch to them.

She thought they were comfortable. The material feels somewhat like bathing suit material but they are still light and breathable. They are made with moisture wicking fabric so they pullmoisturefrom the body to the exterior of the shirt where it can evaporate more easily and keep you dry. She loves this feature!

They are not see through so you can wear them by themselves but they are somewhat clingy and and are on the thin side. So, for some, they may work best worn as a base layer.

One thing she would like to point out is these tanks are on the shorter side. Although they are slightly longer in the back; the front just barely covers her hips. She actually doesn't mind it at all, especially since it's summertime but she wanted to make it known for those who might like longer tops.

Overall she is happy with them and plans to wear them a lot.

reviewText:
I quickly received this in the US mail. What I like about it is the color and the feel of the shirt. The color is a powerful, yet a fun color and the shirt feels like chiffon. The length basically is adequate to what the picture shows, however, it looks a little funny on me. I am not obese but overweight and this shirt does not look as good on me as it does the model. It is not form fitting, so there is a lot of material on my already large(r) body, so it is not very flattering. I would recommend this shirt for people who are the size of the model and smaller. This top definitely adds size, so if you aren't looking to be a bigger looking person, I would not purchase it. If you are, definitely buy it! It is good quality, does not have a funny smell, and the color is very cute!

So I am ordering a full body fitted slip to fix the problem (I need a full body slip anyway so i I'm going to invest the money in it, but it does make this a much more expensive dress by having to add stuff like this to make it wearable). It's too bad cause it's a really great dress- just super thin. It also runs big IMO. I'm 5'1" and 105 and ordered a S and as you see from the pics it's pretty big on me. I purchased the largest size 150, and it said it would fit 10/11 yr old up to 57 inches tall but it is EXTREMELY SHORT. My 9 yr old is on the tall side, she is 56 inches and one quarter and the waist seam falls just a couple of inches below armpits, nowhere near her navel. The dress is also very boxy and wide. Again, my daughter is quite slim and tall, but even so, according to the product description it should have fit. This size is smaller than a L (10) from Gap dresses. This size would probably fit a wider built 7-8 yr old UNDER 54 inches tall (if you want the waist to fall in the right place). Disappointing, because it is a very cute dress!

Update: adding one star for a total of 4 stars, because the seller's customer service sent me a new dress by the same size I originally ordered, and surprisingly, it fit much better! It was definitly a winner with my daughter. Maybe the first time around I got a lemon size, not sure if I would go through ordering again, though.

reviewText:
With summer coming and the pools and beaches calling, I have been gathering up the essentials for fun in the sun. Last year I learned the hard way that wearing your day to day slip-ons to any water activity is not a good idea, nor is it smart to not wear anything. This year I wised up and looked for water socks to wear in the sand or poolside.

The good:
- These water socks are very comfortable. They fit snug, but not tight. I wouldnt go so far as to say feels like being barefoot, but they don't feel like bulky shoes.
- They fit perfectly when using the size chart. For reference, I am a size 6 1/2 womens and I ordered a large.
- They are cute. I like that they are basic black and are very low cut.
- Price is reasonable.
- Non slip surface on the bottom
The bad:
- They don't last. I have had them for less than a month and already the seams are breaking apart. I have worn them 4 times, haven't used them on rough surfaces (I put my shoes on over them when walking to and from) and I keep my toenails short so I am not sure why they would be coming apart so soon.

So, as much as I like them, I would not re-purchase them nor would I recommend them. I break it down like this...I paid $9.99 for them, got 4 uses out of them before they started breaking apart, thats $2.50ish per use. Seems a little high.

No disclosure needed - I am a reviewer of Amazon products and often get things at a discount, however this item I have bought at FULL price for my own personal use. Thank you for reading my review!

Great bag with plenty of room for all of your pool/beach necessities. Easy to carry on shoulder or by hand. Great print. Handles are very sturdy but the knots can come loose causing the ends to pull through the hole with heavier items. Just check to make sure the knots are secure and it will be fine. I absolutely love this bag!!!

This Beach Bag exceeded my expectations on all levels. I wasn't expecting a top of the line name brand bag nor was I looking either. I feel for the inexpensive price I really will get my money's worth out of this. I have only used this one time as the weather is just about heating up. From my obsevation and first use I was impressed. The bag is perfectly sized for the Beach and to bring on our Boat. It is not too small or over sized. The outside canvas material seems to be good quality, the zipper works easily without it getting jammed up. The rope handles are very thick and durable where it held up with the weight I had in this. The inside is as I pictured it to be its lined and has a small pocket where I put my keys and a few little things. The design is bright, vibrant and beautiful for Summer. I was able to fit an over sized Beach Towel, Two bottles of water , suntan lotion a book and my Epi pen with room to spare. I already had a compliment on how pretty it is. One reason I chose this design is because the colors are bright so I can easily spot it from a distance if I decided to  take a swim. Price point was very affordable in my opinion and the seller shipped this pretty fast and arrived sooner than the estimate delivery date! I think it will hold up though the Summer mybe even next Summer as well I will update if it falls apart anytime soon but I really doubt it will. I  wouldn't recommend this if your packing a bag for the whole family as I really think you would need a bigger one but for one or two people it's definitely ideal.
summary: Very Durable and pretty Beach Bag at an affordable price.

reviewText: This bag is just the ticket!  I use it when I got to book conventions.. it holds lots of books.. and the rope handles still make it easy to carry.  I use this when I travel -- it's a perfect carry-on item.  I can put a small handbag, my iPad, snack, water bottle, and light sweater or jacket in here.. and it holds it well.  For takeoff and landing, and simply zip it closed  (the zipper is quite sturdy), and slide it under the seat in front of me.  And the little inside pocket is good for holding my earbuds or anything else that it small and might get lost in the bottom of this bag.

I love the print. But the smell, lack of a fully functioning zipper, rough handles and overall cheap appearance of the bag ... I returned the bag.
It is a beautiful print likely enhanced for the picture online. The zipper hand gaps at both end of the bag that were not covered by the closure or zipper. The bag smelled like burlap and was not washable. I prefer beach bag and bag in general that are washable to make new and start fresh again. This just was not the bag for me. The bag was returned.
Update: LUX E-mailed offering to send a new bag if I provided an item#. I E-mailed Item#. LUX sent a cheap headband that I did not order, will not use, do not want and I will throughout. I will not do business with this company again. They send several E-mail and did not follow through; beware be warned.
summary: cheap appearance, burlap smell, not washable = not the bag for me returned it. Company Plays Games

This is a fantastic addition to what I call my "Vegas Dresses". This is a great example of a LBD (little black dress). You can dress it up with heels and some great jewelry, or dress it down with a pair of flats and a shawl.  The dress is snug, but I was expecting/hoping that it would be. The material is very pretty and very sturdy at the same time, and the metal zipper with a hook and eye closure at the top ensures that your dress will stay on and stay up. I really like the fact that the dress has a built in bra so that I don't have to wear a bra if I don't want to and and the silicone strip around the top ensures that everything stays where is is supposed to with no slinking down on the top. The silvery parts on the dress are woven into the material so you don't have to worry about losing stones everywhere.

The dress does have a very bubble shaped skirt, just like the picture, so if you are looking for something that will have a tight lower half on it you will need to look elsewhere. This dress is fantastic for those of us blessed with more generous tummy and hips as the bubble shaped skirt is very forgiving and provides excellent coverage. Also if you are looking to add a little to make your rear view as lovely as your front without permanently putting it there, this dress is awesome for that too. ;)

I was lucky enough to receive this dress in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. Honestly, I have a tip to Vegas coming up next week and I can hardly wait to wear this!! :)
summary: Super cute LBD for a night out.

Impressive engineering design, for sure, to assure leak-proof function and for easy fill up with wide mouth.
Unfortunately, my sesame seed oil, after a week in the bottle, has developed "rubber" smell from the material of the bottle!.

I really like this set because they are soft, squeezable silicone, which makes it so easy to get out every drop of your product so that you don't end up wasting what cannot be accessed (such as in the case of most plastic bottles). When you remove the caps to fill your bottles, the mouth is big enough to allow you to fill without making a mess. Then, there is a nice feature that allows you to easily identify what product is in each bottle. They have built in labels for shampoo, conditioner, lotion, soap, etc. that you just set to indicate the product within (you just unscrew the cap from the mouth of the bottle, then you push the silicone bottle out of the bottle neck/collar. The bottle neck/collar has little ridges inside and you just use your fingertip to turn it so that a new word will show in the little window. You will hear a click when it has changed to the next label). And, the cap has a special feature that keeps your products from leaking out until you are ready to squeeze and use. The big plus is that they are the perfect size for traveling - especially if you fly as they are TSA approved travel size bottles. Anyone who has ever had to deal with the security in the airports will definitely appreciate the fact that these containers, as well as the pouch they come in, are in keeping with the regulations. As an added bonus, the set comes with three matching silicone toothbrush covers. Everything in one handy travel pouch - I love it! I would recommend this set to anyone who travels.

I purchased this set at a reduced price to use and review. This is my honest experience and opinion and I hope it is helpful to you.

These are a great set!  I absolutely love the travel bottles.  The silicone makes them very easy to squeeze and use.  The lids seal very tightly (no leaking on the plane -- I had them in both a carry on and in my checked luggage).  The twisty labels and different colors make it very easy to see which one you are using,  the bag is great -- so much more rugged than the disposable quart zipper bag I was using before.  Wider and stable and was easily taken through security holding more than the bottles that were included.

My only concern is that they seem a little expensive for what they are.  Although, I have seen others of these bottles and wanted to buy them but found them to be ridiculously expensive.  So, it must just be the technology itself that makes these pricey.  Definitely worth it for reusable, rugged, leak proof containers!

Please note:  I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.  I am so happy I tried them -- I would have been reluctant to take the risk, but these are worth it.
summary: No leaks on the plane!  Easy to use bottles and bag!

reviewText:
The secret to passing TSA checkpoint without hassle is having everything the way they want it.  One thing that is always a pain point is the toiletry.  Not everything comes in 3 oz. or less containers.  So you try to adjust the volume but yet they still freak out because the bottle says 6 oz. but only quarter of the item is in the bottle. I have had several not so happy experiences with our friendly neighborhood TSA agents.  I guess common sense is not so common.  So after my last fun interaction I decided to get something that will help me avoid the issue in future.  So this was the best thing I was looking for.  It comes with the bag and has four containers.  And you can change the label of each of the container by twisting the cap so it shows shampoo, lotion, conditioner and others.  That way you know what it is and unlike others that have stickers that fall off eventually, these don't come off.  Also it comes with toothbrush covers as well.  Which is great, because one time a while back one of the after shave bottle leaked and well I was not sure if I should brush my teeth or use it on my face after shaving.  Nothing like calling room service to get you a toothbrush before a big meeting.  Overall, this is a great kit.  I will be ordering another one for my wife and the kids because that way when we travel each of us has one.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone.  Enjoy!

Disclaimer: I received this product at a reduced price so that I would give my unbiased honest opinion, which I did. That did not influence me in any way. If this review has been helpful, feel free to indicate so by clicking the yes button.
summary: One more thing to help avoid an unpleasant experience with TSA

reviewText: I LOVE LOVE LOVE the travel bottles!  I have a set myself and got another for my daughter.  I plan on getting more for gifts as our family travels a lot and I've noticed some of the kids buy the small travel bottles at the store but those are just 1-2 ounces and I like to fill them full and as soon as we return from our trip I refill and put away for the next trip all ready to go.  The reason I love these bottles so much is they are made of a really soft flexible silicone and this makes it very easy to squeeze the contents out.  I've had some of the harder plastic ones and they are very hard to get product out when you can't squeeze them.  These also have a little suction cup on the side of the bottle so if you don't have much shower space, you can place on the wall and just flip the cap open and it's literally at your fingertips.  They also come in white, light blue, light green, and pink.  Two of them say shampoo near the ring and the other 2 say conditioner.  It's small enough you won't notice if you want to use for lotions or other things.  This set also includes 3 frosty clear toothbrush covers.  I received these items at a reduced rate in exchange for my honest review.
summary: I LOVE LOVE LOVE the travel bottles

No real surprise there since everything is long on me- my mom can sew and can remedy the length. I ordered the black and white dress, and noticed that the skirt had a bit of a sheen in the black, but it's actually the built in satin slip! I like the way it gives a shimmer to the skirt and also keeps the dress from being see through. The button around the neck was hard for me to do while wearing the dress, but the top as a lot of stretch and I am able to get it on buttoned. I saw that other reviews commented on the sewing- mine looked fine all around. I will update after repeated wear and washing.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

The top looks small, but it's very stretchy and fits very well. Love the waist of the dress, it is very thinning, especially the waist. I am excited to wear it to an upcoming wedding! I haven't washed it yet, but it appears to be able to handle the washing machine.. Very appropriate for summer! Love that it doesn't show a lot of skin, so it is appropriate to wear.

reviewText:
This dress takes a loooooooong time to get here!  I must say I am pleasantly surprised with this item.  It is well made and roomy, almost a little larger than we expected!

There are no tags or anything sewn or otherwise attached to this dress.  I'm a little afraid to think how it was made.  The waistband had a little orange stain, it seemed, in a couple of places and it seemed a little hastily installed.

The skirt is very long for my daughter.  She's probably about 5'4" and the skirt has to be almost a foot long!  I know it's a maxi dress but this is a little extreme.  I am going to have to get it altered before she can wear it.

She loves it and it does look very good on her so I didn't want the hassle of trying to exchange it or return it.  Just beware of this when you buy it, it's really very long!

This is despite my ordering based on the size chart, and ordering a much larger size than I would normally take.  Also, it is not very well made. The fabric is very thin, and see-through, seams are clumsily put together, and they used very cheap white plastic buttons (not all plastic buttons are bad, but these are sub-standard. I would definitely not have bought this in the store - would not even have tried it on.

I'm sorry to give this product a poor review, but I feel it is warranted in this case.
If you do decide to order, order it several sizes up, plan to use it as a layer over other items (tank tops, etc.), and wash it on cold, to prevent shrinkage. The colors, however, are represented accurately, and are nice.

reviewText: They are just what I wanted for riding my motorcycle. They came quickly and with a lot of extra goodies.
Nice, light sunglasses. Nice package. Found them a bit "darker" than what I am used to - but good for very bright days.

First off, kudos to the seller for being extremely responsive to issues with the product, even minor ones like a scratch to the bottom rim of one of the lenses. It's not everyday that you find sellers who stand by the quality of their merchandise, and this is honestly one of the higher quality items you can buy for under $25 on Amazon.

These polarized sunglasses distinguish themselves from similar glasses that you can find in stores and elsewhere in several ways. Of course, the brand isn't quite well known in the US, so that's not one of its selling points. But its magnesium/aluminum frame (both lightweight, strong metals used for aircraft and the like), elegant yet functional design, and polarized lenses will give even top-of-the-line Raybans a run for your money. Oh, and did I mention these are under $25 while comparable name brand glasses are much more expensive?

The thing I love most about these sunglasses is that they actually block UV rays. Like, I've shelled out money before on cheap sunglasses, and was disappointed to find that they only made everything dark. The bad thing about making everything dark is that doing so tricks your pupils into dilating and letting in more light, and more UV rays, which is definitely not good for your retinas and bad for your health too. These polarized sunglasses diffract sunlight and do not let UV rays get through. As a result, things aren't that dark when you wear these sunglasses, and your eyes are really protected from UV rays.

Other things I liked about this pair of sunglasses:
- lightweight yet strong, thanks to the metal frame
- flexible rubber/silicone/some polymer nose grips
- are comfortable, even when wearing normal prescription glasses under these

They're designed in Italy and imported, but I'm not sure where they're imported from.

If you're looking for a pair of sunglasses to wear while driving or doing winter sports (the ice/snow will reflect sunlight and dazzle you), this is a solid option that you won't regret buying. I really can't recommend this enough.

Product sample provided at a discount or for free for review purposes.

Here are some photos of the sunglasses and the accessories it comes with - a hard synthetic leather case, a black microfiber cleaning cloth, a black felt drawstring bag, and a hex screwdriver keychain (not sure why this was included, but okay)

reviewText: Made very poorly

Judging by the stock photos versus the photos posted in another review, I knew before buying that this bag is a replica of the bag shown in the pictures and that those stock photos don't really belong to this seller. I will say though that this is certainly great quality for a replica and a great price! I received the bag more than a week before the expected delivery date, which was a pleasant surprise, and it just happened to arrive the day before a friend of mine died so it's been very comforting having this big bunny to hold onto while my real life bunny is living back home in another state and can only comfort me through skype.

One of the biggest reasons I bought this bag was because it has lots of room to hold things (which most stuffed animal bags really do not) and it definitely does not fail me in that regard. I can fit my water bottle (which is medium to large), wallet (which is on the large side), keys, makeup, notebook (as in a paper one, not a laptop), and tablet in the main pocket with room left over for a small snack or some pads/tampons and my phone, comb and clipper card fit perfectly into the small pocket in the back (it's also a perfect spot to put something like a condom that you wouldn't want being shown to the world every time you unzip your purse). Everything kind of slides down into the belly of the bunny so you can feel your stuff when you poke the belly.

The cuteness factor is also on point, this bag would definitely fit well with sweet lolita and fairy kei styles and oddly enough, it poses a kind of awesome, "so off it works" opposition in punk, goth and cult pary kei styles. My favorite part, appearance-wise, in the stock photos was the blush on the bunny's cheeks which the actual bag I received did not have so I ended up putting some of my own blush on the cheeks and while it brushes off and I have to reapply it every week or so, worked pretty well and looks very cute.

The material of the bag is very very soft and of pretty good quality, the lining  inside is a little thin/cheap so I would be careful about putting things with sharp edges like a mechanical pencil inside so that the lining doesn't rip. The zipper also seems a tad bit cheap so I would definitely recommend being gentle with it and not over-stuffing the bag.

Overall the bag is so cute that I can't stop taking pictures of it and perfectly bridges my needs for practicality, novelty and style.

summary: Pretty Good Quality for a Great Price, Very Functional

I always have a hair tie on my wrist, and it just ruins my bracelet game, so when I found out about these I was stoked. I bought this kind and the kind that has more of an indentation/groove "cut" into the bracelet itself. I much prefer the cut-groove type. Because this is just convex (the edges just bend up slightly to hold the hair elastic on the bracelet) the hair tie slides out very easily. I also felt the the cut bracelets were thicker/sturdier, and they were textured at the bottom of the groove which also helped the hair tie to not slip out. I far prefer that product, but the seller did have good customer service when I returned my order (previously, at my time of purchase, the title misleading said you got 2 bracelets. I'm not sure if I would have been able to return if the description weren't wrong)

Love these! My daughter had a fun time opening each package and trying on every color. The metallic fabric is soft and stretchy. My baby girl is 21 months old. I had to stretch them a bit to get a comfortable fit for her. So, I think they would work for a younger baby easily and stretched to fit an older child as well. Stretching doesn't effect the quality of the fabric. It's nice and strong with a quality shine. They're good for dress up play or special occasions, Halloween - lots of options. Product is exactly what I thought it would be. Fits comfortable, and is adjustable, both in the nose and around the head. Shipment also came with two free pairs of paper diffraction glasses which was nice!

This is the absolute sexiest pair of running pants not only that I own, but that I've ever seen. I am so  in love with them.

 I've had some bad experiences recently with clothing ordered online not sized correctly.  These are sized just perfectly.  I am 5'3, 135 pounds and I ordered the medium.  They fit me like a glove. I have been complimented every time I've worn these, even to the point that a younger girl screamed at me across the kids clothing section at Walmart to tell me she LOVED my leggings and ask where I got them. These pants also accentuate womanly curves and make your butt look phenomenal. Any lumpy areas are made smooth in these pants. I love the wide waist, it works so effectively to hide my muffintop.

I've gone over every inch of these pants and the seams are flawless. What I really appreciate is the quality material. I have nothing but running pants in my wardrobe and typically even a hangnail can wreak havoc and ruin running pants.  I have scratched these, had my Chihuahua jump on them and dig her nails in, and there are still no runs. They hold their gorgeous colors even after half a dozen times in the washer and dryer. I'm also very grateful that the back of these pants is clearly marked. Seems like some pant makers have stopped doing this. And once in awhile I realize my pants are on backwards.  These pants have a different design on the back which helps, too, but I like having a tag in the back of my pants...less worry for me. These are not see through at all.

I am pretty picky about exercise socks.  I just never seem to find some that I am happy with, or at least some that I am happy with for very long.  I do like these socks from Pro Mountain.  I ordered the white with the grey accents and I am happy with the way these socks look.  The best part is that they are also very comfortable.  There is padding on the bottom, and around the toe and elastic compression around the arch.  These socks are very breathable and have been very comfortable from everything from walks to cardio workouts and bowling. I am very happy with my purchase of these socks and would recommend them to others.  I did receive this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review, but that in no way has any influence of my opinion of the product I am reviewing.

reviewText:
I wore the socks when i went bowling Thursday evening for a couple of hours, when i came home the elastic around the socks made a dent in the skin of my ankles, which made it quite painful. Other then that the socks were fine. I really loved the part of the sock where it was breathable near the toes area, That was the nice part, so your feet don't get all hot and sweaty.

73% Quality Combed Cotton / 20% SPANDEX / 5% Polyurethane / 2% Polyester, Made in South Korea.
3 or 6 pairs, Low Cut length(Approx. on your peach bone) daily sports socks for men with Y-stitch heel.
S size : US Women Shoes 5.5~7.5, M size = US Women Shoes 7.5~9.5 = Men 6.5~8

Design : diamond-patterned dual instep mesh and ribbed cuff with spandex

Function : dual Instep mesh, bottom cushioning, Y-stitch heel and arch-supporting elastane protect your feet, absorb sweat ,moisture wicking and ventilation.

1 year of Quality Guarantee - if torn or get hole we will replace them for free. No questions asked.

Disclaimer:  I can assure you that I tried the product first before giving my honest opinion and to top it off i received this product for a discount.

I really like these socks!  Coming from a self-proclaimed sock hater who avoids socks whenever possible, that's saying something!  I actually ordered these for my daughter but didn't pay close enough attention to the size when doing so.  As she wears a size 7, they were a bit roomy on her.  However, they fit my size 9 foot perfectly!  These socks are soft, comfy, and have the perfect amount of cushion to them.  It may sound silly, but I love the touch of gray around the ankle and on the bottom because it makes it easy to spot the match when folding laundry.  These stay in place well and breathe nicely.  A lot of low cut socks are almost too thin, but these are a nice weight for year-round wear.  They've held up nicely through several washes thus far and really seem to be high quality socks.

Like you, I rely on reviews when selecting products to purchase. As a product tester, I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for providing an honest review, but this review is based solely on the merits of this product itself; any discount I may have received has no bearing on my assessment and evaluation of it.
summary: I'm a sock hater, but I really like these!

reviewText:
So I decided to get these underwear for my boyfriend, he is a mechanic and complains about how he gets hot easily in his work pants. So score for me because they are a sexy underwear. Then score for him to in this hot weather he is comfortable and cool.

Disclaimer:
I received this product at a full promotional discount for my honest and unbiased review in return.

Underwear is NOT one of those things I talk about, but let's face it we all (well most of us) wear them everyday, so it's great to find some that not just look nice but fit well and are made to last.

I was introduced to the Astarin brand recently and was really impressed by the look of them and accepted an offer to get some in exchange for an honest review. What struck me first when they arrived was that they are made so that you don't have to worry about that sticky feeling you can get with some underwear. These are made for life on the go with mesh sides and back so that your skin can breathe. They're attractive underwear that fit well and move along with you.

The only caution I would offer is to make sure you look at the size chart to ensure you get the size that is best for you. If you do that I think you'll be fine and will see these low rise underwear as a nice addition to your life.
summary: Astarin's low rise underwear are not just attractive but made for life on the go

I bought the long-sleeved version, and liked it so much that I bought the sleeveless one for warm weather. This very simple style feels ancient and modern at the same time. It is easy to accessorize. I usually wear something simple  bone earrings and a bone pendant on a leather cord, but have also worn a big necklace and wide, slouchy belt.

 The fabric is lovely, with a very slight sheen and slubby like raw silk. The weave is not really flat, like linen, it's more like gauze, but more tightly woven. It drapes nicely. It's good for warm weather, because it breathes, but you can wear it all the way from mid-spring to mid-fall. When it gets chilly, I plan to wear this dress over leggings and/or a t-shirt, with booties.

The color matches the photos. The orangey red is beautiful, and it didn't run. It has an ivory bottom layer, so I paired it with a long, ivory lace cardigan, and in cooler weather, with a drapey, ivory, waterfall cardigan. The green one has a coffee-colored layer underneath, so I echo that color with a beige gauze big shirt, like a light jacket. (Everything I mention was purchased on Amazon.)

As other reviewers have complained, the fabric is a bit fragile, and can rip at the seams.
It will also pill terribly if you throw it in the washer and dryer.
My advice is:
1) Buy the appropriate size. I am 5'6", 175 lbs., and it fits comfortably, but not baggy. I can sit in it, and reach, and walk, without straining the seams.
2) wash it in the machine (who wants to wash by hand?) in cold water, on delicate, but first turn it inside out and put it in a large "delicates" bag.

I bought a few of these. I did rip a seam, but it's easy to sew. I also washed one of these without taking care, and it got a slight fuzz which pilled so badly I gave up on it. I have been reasonably careful since, and enjoy wearing them.

summary: Cheap quality! Didn't last a week!

reviewText: I bought this bag to use as a daybag.  I like to go downtown and wanted something to carry my iPad, sketching book and pencils, wallet, camera, and anything else I might find useful while exploring.  This bag is the perfect size for all this.  It is not so big to be cumbersome, or too small to fit all my stuff in.  An iPad filts nicely, but a laptop would be too big.  The bag is very sturdy, made of a lightweight canvas with an adjustable nylon shoulder strap.  The stitching on the bag is well done.  I think this bag will hold up well for many years.  Inside the bag has a couple of slots for your phone, and one zippered pocket.  The inside of the bag is secured with a zipper.  The outside of the bag has 2 pockets.  The contents of these pockets are held in place by the top flap with snaps over the pockets.

Complaints:
Edit 3: I have received about 20 emails from the seller asking me to take down this negative review before I can get my money back (which is weird because I've already gotten it back...). I will remove this review when you put pictures of the actual dress up. I'm sorry, but it is not the same dress and this is false advertising. If I could give it 0 stars I would just to spite this seller who paid for those other 5 Star reviews, and for having to continually ask them to leave me alone since I returned it 2 months ago.

-the sleeves are really tight.  I usually wear an 8, but I ordered a 10, thinking I could take it in if I needed to, but the sleeves are still too tight.
-the edges of the sleeves are not detailed like they are in the picture.  they just bluntly end (see photo)
-the lace is not very elegant looking.  I wish there were more up close pictures, because other wise I wouldnt have bought it.  It looks cheap and hastily put together.  Around the waist where the lace is supposed to be tacked down, a lot of the tackings have broken, so there are several flappy pieces of lace there.

EDIT: after looking at the product pictures again, I can now see that it is NOT the same lace.  Please look at my pictures for what the lace really looks like.  I have now changed my rating to 2 stars because of it.

EDIT 2: after asking for a refund, the seller saw my negative review and was willing to compensate me $80. After accepting the compensation, they changed their minds and said I would have to return the dress to get any money. Do you know how much it costs to ship to China? $50 is the cheapest I can find so far. I've changed my review to 1 star because of this whole ordeal. Do not buy this dress. I'm pretty sure those other reviews were provided by a company who writes good reviews for money.

Praises:
-the skirt is fully lined.  In the picture where you can see her leg, it is because there is a leg slit in the lining.
-after asking for it to be shipped ASAP, the seller got back to me and told me to expect it in 2 weeks (even though it says 3-5 weeks in the description) and I got it only a week later.
-This is very long and will fit any height person, you just have to have it tailored if you are very short.

This shapewear looks like a regular brief but the material is on the thinner side, so when you wear them it fits more like a thong or a cheeky bottom. This isn't a problem for me because that is the type of underwear I prefer, plus you don't get a panty line like I was expecting. However, for those of you who do not enjoy wearing a thong these probably are not for you.

Overall this is a good affordable shapewear. It is not the best I have ever tried but I will definitely get use out of it.

I received a discount on this product in exchange for my honest review.
summary: This shapewear looks like a regular brief but the material is on the ...

reviewText: I originally ordered a size medium because that was my shirt size and this is a more stomach control top but when i got it i felt it was a little too big so i decided to re order and get a size small.  Just an FYI my high waist is 29" while my hips are 44". The product came very quickly and came packaged in a small zip lock pouch.  Like others have stated it says victoria secret on it so that's awesome, this doesn't say victoria secret on the top like the size medium does but it still says sexy little things at the bottom and the writing is in silver.  Just like the medium this does not look like a thong at all its looks like a brief but it fits more like an itsy and cheeky bottom.  So it's sort of a thong but not really.  Like the medium i did turn it around where the care and size info is in the front at my belly button and it fits more like a thong that way.  Still wasn't much difference for the control top when turning it around and it did give you more of a thong look which is good because that means i can wear it with some dresses and skirts.  So i would suggest doing that to anyone who is needing a more thong like shapewear. Since I went down a size the control top definitely does its job now it sucks in my stomach a little bit more than the size medium.  It also doesn't roll down at the top like the medium did. They're are comfortable and not too tight which is really good.  I am really glad i decided to order a second pair and go down a size because i feel like this one does a better job than the medium. To be honest the size small is a little hard to get over my hips but worth it to get that more fitted feel in the stomach.  I'm giving it 4 stars just because this is my second pair i had to purchase and had to go down a size to get a more fitted garment to be worn with certain dresses.  Also because it isn't a true thong like i was hoping for.  I still would recommend this to others who are looking for a control top shapewear bottom but would let them know to go down a size or to be aware its not a tight control top.  I received this product at a discount for my honest opinion.
summary: Better when i went down a size

reviewText:
I love these tummy control underwear. I just under went abdominoplasty a little over 7 weeks ago. I'm required to wear some type of garment to help with the swelling. These are one of the garments I picked.

The material feels similar to plastic. Unlike plastic these don't pinch or irritate my skin. They come up about 1 inch from my belly button. The back of these are a high rise, almost similar to a thick thong, but more comfortable.

The inside of these panties have the print Victoria Secrets, which it is not. Reguardless of the miss print and spelling on the back I still think these are a great pair of underwear. They do exactly what I needed them to do!

Very simple yet cute design. It's hard to see it in the photos but the top half of the bust has round sequins that shimmer when they catch the light. The material seems pretty durable. It doesn't feel like it's about to rip. The fit is pretty good...it should fit a broad variety of shapes and sizes, unless you are very tiny up top, in which case you might not have enough to hold up the bust part. But it should fit ideally size mediums but also small and even larges, depending on your frame size. Bottom line, this isn't a tiny little piece of lingerie that will only fit a size 2. I wear mediums and am a 34D up top and it seems to fit me fine. I don't look as good as the model, but hey, how many people really do? It does not come with matching panties. You will have to provide your own, which should be easy enough as sexy black panties abound. I like the outfit. My boyfriend hasn't seen it yet but he may only be so-so on the embellished top part. I know this from past experiences. He likes sexy clothes but doesn't seem to care for added ornamentation or things that dangle. Then again, I think this dress is pretty basic really, and he'll like it at least somewhat ;)

Product  Features
Body: 70% Nylon/30% Elastane; Crotch Lining: 100% CottonElastic closureHand WashFirm control
I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review. This does not change my opinion of this product in any way. My reviews are for the consumer and have not been manipulated or compensated in any way.

This is an excellent quality control top underwear. The fabric is thick and truly is a higher quality item than I've seen. The fabric is very silky which makes it glide over my clothes. I have enjoyed this aspect as it hides the fact that I'm wearing it rather well. I am able to get the firm control that I need without anyone knowing.

The sizing was correct for me. I wear a size 6/7 pants size and the medium fit me perfectly. It was not to tight where it was uncomfortable, but it was tight enough to give me the proper support.

Washing did not shrink this either. I washed this on a cold delicate wash cycle and hung it up to dry. Washing it this way did not damage it in any way and I did not have any shrinking issues.

The craftsmanship on this is excellent as well. The stitching is expertly done. Each stitch is tight with no loose pieces of thread. After carefully examining all seams, I still do not see any rips, tears or fraying anywhere on this. The very top has a non slip line. This line keeps the control top locked in place. I am able to put this on and go about my day. I have not once had to readjust or pull the control top back up.

Overall, I would recommend this. It is well made with quality materials. The sizing is correct and washing did not shrink it. I rate this 5/5 stars. I did receive this at a discounted or free rate for my honest and unbiased opinion, but all opinions expressed are my own.

Sizing: I usually wear a size 7 in pants, but my tummy has gotten rather flabby and Im currently in a size 9. I ordered the size Medium, and it seems to fit correctly.

This shapewear is silky and comfortable, and it is similar in height to my Spanx. I really like how the panty area on the Camellias hi-waist brief is lighter than the rest of it since I don't need the support in that area. This also helps to keep me cooler, especially since were starting to have warm weather. The waist has the same type of sticky material (silicone, I think) that keeps it up as my Spanx. This one has not rolled down or left me feeling like I constantly need to readjust or pull it up. The quality is quite nice: no loose threads and seams are stitched well. I have washed this in a lingerie bag on a cold cycle and hung to dry several times without any problems.

This shapewear offers good control/support of my tummy. It also helps alleviate some of my lower back pain because it reminds me to have good posture. I don't have any unsightly panty or waist lines, although some fabrics do tend to not glide over it as well as others (just like with my other shapewear products). This brief does not have the hook and eye fasteners at the crotch so it does have to be pulled down to use the restroom. I feel that I am getting moderate to firm control with this product, but not as much control as with the maximum control shapewear that I have. Overall, it is more comfortable than my Spanx, silkier, and lighter weight in the panty area. I would recommend it for moderate control.

I received this shapewear for free in exchange for my honest review. I did not receive any other compensation, and I am not obligated to write a favorable review. I have used this product myself, and all words in this review are my own.
summary: Comfortable with moderate to firm control

reviewText: SUPER comfy maternity shirt. I love bamboo fabric - it's so much softer than cotton. Also does that moisture-wicking thing, though that seems to be a nice euphemism for sweat-absorbing. I live in Phoenix though, so 'moisture-wicking' is very helpful on crazy hot days. The neckline is pretty low if that is a concern for you. The belly part is the perfect amount of stretch - it conforms nicely to a 2nd trimester tummy - not just a tent of fabric like some maternity shirts I have seen. It hugs a smaller bump enough that it looks like a baby bump, but it stretches out for a bigger bump without a problem. I'm actually not sure how they accomplished this, since it doesn't have the stitches in ruching that others do. Overall, super comfy and my go-to maternity tank.
summary: Great maternity tank, bamboo fabric FTW!

reviewText:
If your wife is like my wife, then she wants to wear matching clothes as a couple. Im normally not a big fan of matching clothes, especially in public, but these matching panties and underwear are an exception!  Plus, wearing these in public (under outer clothes) is like having a secret no one else knows about, that we can giggle and share a connection to each other over.

I got a pair of red ones for us for Christmas. The material is very soft and feels great against skin.  My wife is extremely picky about comfort and these were exceptionally comfortable for her to wear. (not itchy, scratchy, chafe, hard constriction, etc.) They are very comfortable for me to wear too and I might buy more for everyday use!

I love the design of the fly (male version, no fly on panties). It is a large vertical opening, so the member can go up and out. This is an amazing invention so theres no odd binding or contortions coming out. The flap keeps things secure in their place until you want them out (for whatever purpose you have in mind).

As for sizing, These are manufactured in Asia, so their sizes are different than U.S. I normally wear a medium and wife wears a large.  I ordered a medium for me and large for her. The size imprinted on the as received label was XXL (180/105) for mens, and XL (165/90) for womens.  Both fit us perfectly.

As for color matching, ours matched perfectly. Same color.
summary: Amazingly Soft and Comfortable, Wife and I Love it

Size Information (in inches) :

XL: Chest : 36.6" Waist : 29.5" Length : 35"

Well constructed gown with lovely full volume flowing chiffon. Fit EXACTLY per the measurements. Prompt shipping. Beautiful color (more "coral/light peach" than orange). Two tier satin underskirt, followed by a top layer of very generous (voluminous) chiffon over-lay. Zipper "struggles" a bit where it transitions from the lower portion of the dress into the bottom of the bodice, because that section of the dress has a "thicker pass" of multi layered materials of which the zipper has to handle. Halter top attachment provides a single "eye hook," so we might add an additional eye hook for a more secure closure. No missing gems. Some gem sections were a "bit looser" than others. Gems were primarily silver in color with multi colored inserts which creates a more expensive looking beaded bodice. Small bag of additional gems were provided. Height- 5''7, weight- 152, waist- 28, hips- 38, bust - 35~ SIZE 8 was a perfect fit. Daughter is wearing 4 inch heels, thus avoiding having to alter the length of the dress.

I ordered the M&Z loose fit T-shirt in white, size XL.  It fit as I expected after looking at the pictures and reading the description. I normally wear a L in US sizes and the XL fit comfortably. It is probably a little tighter than intended, but it isn't a close fit. I laid the T-shirt flat on the table and measured across the back of it as follows: Bust 20, Waist 19.5, Hip (hem) 21, Length 26.5. And I guess I should leave a disclaimer for the measurements being as accurate as I can achieve in home conditions.
  This T-shirt is made with a lightweight and soft knit fabric with wonderful drape. Its made of 95% modal and 5% spandex. The spandex allows this fabric to stretch, but still retain its shape. The modal has similar properties with rayon and is one of the most comfortable materials to wear, especially on a hot summer day.
 I really like this T-shirt. It is a very simple style, with an interesting, asymmetrical neckline. It is very light and soft against my skin. The white fabric is somewhat see through, but it looks fine with a skin tone bra. The washing instructions are printed on the paper tag and state machine wash and air dry. I haven't washed this yet, but I am assuming that it should be washed in cold like most modal fabrics. This T-shirt is very comfortable and I have a feeling that I will be wearing this often!

I am in love with my new purse. This purse feels so smooth to the touch. It is the popular hobo style crossbody. The strap is adjustable, so the longer you make it, the easier it is to wear it across your chest (Crossbody style). However, you can shorten the strap and wear it over one shoulder as you normally would with any purse. Either way is comfortable, but I prefer the crossbody. I love that my purse is always close to my body. When Im grocery shopping, it is attached to my body (not in the cart as I turn my back to grab something). Also, with a young child, wear my purse across my chest lets me be hands free, so I can run after him, help him, pick him up, etc. without my purse falling off my shoulder. I have the blue bag. It is two toned with a light pinkish/lavender type color. The color is very unique, but the two colors mesh well together. They also sell it in black, brown, and gray (all having the two toned look). The lining inside feels soft, smooth, yet durable. I can easily pull out the lining to dump out any crumbs, sand, hair that accumulates in the bottom of my purse. The purse has two tassels on each side. Yes, they are for looks (and seem to be in style right now, as I see them a lot), but if you pull them tight, the bag closes (drawstring feature). I don't normally pull mine tight. I leave the tassel draw strings fully stretched out and to close the bag, I use the interior magnet closure. I really enjoy the magnet compared to a zipper because its easy access. However, the magnet is super strong, so I feel confident that my belongings are safe and will not accidentally fall out. The hardware is gold toned. The purse comes with a small blue zippered bag. It is long sort of like a pencil holder. Ive been using it to hold my makeup which I keep in my purse. This purse may look small, but I can fit a lot in it. My daily belongings which I keep in the bag are: the zippered case with makeup in it, my wallet, business card holder, small hand sanitizer, keys, cellphone, sunglasses, travel size tissues, chapstick, travel size deodorant, daily medications, and sometimes I can throw a water bottle in there. I love how there is a spot for everything. Everything can be organized neatly. Inside there are two cellphone sized pockets, then there is the main space, then a zippered area with a gap leading to another zippered area. I LOVE the gap area because it is the perfect size to fit my sunglasses. Nothing touches them, so I don't have to worry about them getting scratched. Also, this purse stands up on its own. My biggest pet-peeve is when purses are flimsy and fall over. This one does NOT do that. It does not have the feet underneath, but it still stands up on its own. All in all, this is an amazing purse for the price. It looks like a designer bag. It has a small logo stitched to the bottom of the bag (the two-toned side). Also, I love that I can choose to just wear it on the blue side if I choose. I highly recommend this purse for its beauty, functionality, style, and durability. I received this purse complimentary in exchange for my genuine evaluation and product review.
summary: two toned beauty. functional. stylish. durable. my favorite bag to date

reviewText:
I purchased this derby style hat for my mom to wear to my daughters "Tea for Two" themed birthday party. It came completely smooshed but absolutely adorable!

All of my mother's clothes have either been previously mine or picked out by me so it was no surprise that she let me choose her party hat without seeing it first. I chose a long black lacy dress of mine for her to wear and this hat went with it perfectly. I bought the "dark red" but as you can see the main color looks more purple. The colors are vibrant but not too bright.

The hat was folded and pretty smooshed and crooked but I'm glad I had about four days to flatten it out with heavy books on every side. It flattened easily and looked great by party day. This a very unique hat and would look wonderful at parties, church, holiday's, races, etc.
