First I have to say this dress arrived A LOT sooner than expected (weeks in advance) which was fantastic. I ended up putting this dress on my daughter for a photo-shoot to mark her 2.5 year milestone. The dress photographs very well and its a really cute style. While the dress looks great and was put together well, the fabric is low quality. It is so thin that you can see right through it and it wrinkles very easily. The blue on the bottom of the dress is just a ribbon sewn on (I was hoping it was blue fabric). I am actually nervous about washing the dress out of fear that the fabric will fall apart. I will be hand washing it later this weekend and hanging it to dry. Another down side was that the right side of the collar had a small tear in the fabric---it was easily covered up when I tied the bow at the neck but it was definitely a bit of a let down. This dress is really a 1 or 2 time use dress unless you have the time and patience for what appears will be a lot of hand washing and ironing.

reviewText: I love this suit. It is very stylish and hides all the things us women don't want showing. The blue and black contrast is gorgeous and it makes you feel very confident and sexy while covered up.

I placed the order and it arrived fifteen days later, so give yourself the acquired time needed when making this purchase.  It arrived in a plastic bag inside of a sealed plastic bag in great shape.  I removed the protective crotch shield and washed the swim suit before wearing it and it held up fine.  I ordered the yellow top suit and it is still pretty and vibrant after washing it a second time.  I purchased this swim suit to wear in a pool, during my aqua fitness swim class.  It fit as expected according to the Zmart sizing.  I am currently a plus size 16/18 and the Zmart sizing chart suggested 3XL which is what I ordered.  I am 5'7'and 235 lbs. and this swim suit fits all of my curves well.  My husband told me I look sexy in the suit and I have received compliments from my aqua fitness and college classmates as well after posting some photos on social media.  The swim suit has a slit on each side to remove the bra pads which didn't seem to shift too often while exercising, so that was a plus for me having large nipples.  The straps stayed in place once on.  The sides didn't roll up around the thigh area nor did the suit travel between my bottom which is another plus for me.  I like the way it make me look so much so, that I will be placing an order for the blue and the white top swim suits to wear when we travel back to the Caribbean for vacation.  I definitely recommend this swim suit and for the price, it's a great deal!!!

reviewText:
I love the look of this really cute flowy dress. The tie dye pattern is very trendy and the way the dress flows is flattering. Because the description said it was a loose fitting dress and stretchy, I ordered a Medium. I have ordered Large in other ROMWE items and they have fit with some wiggle room. What I didn't know was that this one has no stretch at all. It is tight around my bust. Perfect everywhere else but just tight enough to be a a bit uncomfortable around the upper chest,

The dress goes to mid calf and really looks good. A pair of sandals and a sun hat and you're good to go! I am going to try to see how I can get an inch or so of space in the chest area so I can wear this because it's perfect everywhere else. I am 5'5". 124 pounds, 36B/C for reference. I wish I had just bought the Large but I assumed this would have stretch and be loose on me.

Still, it's a really good looking, lightweight dress or even a top with leggings. Buy the size you need because there is no give at all so you want to go bigger instead of smaller in sizing with this one. Well made, pretty, and so trendy this season. I WILL find a way to wear it comfortably. As you see in the pics, it isn't that tight since I have it on so I am going to make it work darn it! It's that cute!

I received this item in exchange for my honest review. I was very happy to choose this dress as it is my favorite. I still love it and am hoping to wear it this summer.

I purchased this as a fathers day gift for my father, who is a textile industry worker. The overall design and style had him speechless. It is such an eye catcher. Anyone and Everyone notices it. And complements it. He has mentioned several times how many times he is stopped and asked about it. Pine has such a nice subtle color tone, so it pairs well with any color. You can dress it up or wear it casually. Such a beautiful piece! I received this at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased opinion.

I received my Apache (original) pine watch today and I must say......... It was love at first sight!
I love the simplicity and style of this watch.  I don't need all the fancy features that a lot of watches offer.  I need to know what time it is and I need it to look cool on my arm :).
This watch is very light and the genuine leather band feels great against my skin.  It seems to made of quality material and seems like it will be durable as well. The watch itself is made out of wood and the engraving on the back says "we belong to the earth, the earth does not belong to us" which I think is pretty awesome!!
I definitely want to get the black watch next because I have a sneaking suspision that I am going to want to wear this watch every day and black is a big part of my color pallett ;)

*I received my Alache Pine watch at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  My opinions of this watch are authentically my own ;)

Bought the "Ridge" watch for my husband this Christmas. He absolutely loves it. Good quality product and awesome design! Thinking of getting one for myself too. Apache Pine has excellent customer service and am I recommending them to all my friends and family.
summary: Good quality product and awesome design

I get compliments on it all the time and I've never had an issue with it. Their customer service is great too.

Great costume... I was worried reading the reviews about a faulty zipper or possibly poor workmanship. I have to say for the price you really couldn't ask for much better. The "suit" and it's a full suit... is lined as you would find on a decent jacket. It's  lined in brown satin-like polyester, the zipper is well made, standard YKK. The issue I could see happening with a zipper is the long "fur" getting trapped inside while zipping. If you were frustrated and pulled it way to hard you could break the zipper or tear the material... this would happen with any zipper/fur combo. Just take you time and make sure the fur is pulled away while zipping. The cuffs are elastic like on  a decent jacket also. The feet are as they appear but open to the bottom so shoes could be put on, really a nice touch. No gloves but doubt my son would wear them if included. The mask is well, cheap and although it would work, it does not look like the picture. Not a real concern for us since we had purchased the "roaring" wookie mask... it makes for a perfect finished Chewbacca !!!! Sizing -  my son is 44 inches tall and not chunky, just a normal little boy of 5.5 y.o.a.... the small size fits perfectly. Unfortunately the amazon page for this costume does not contain a sizing chart so I had to go to the  manufacturers site and their sizing is true to fit.  Very happy with the purchase (made Dad look like a rockstar!!!) and what's really more important my son is overjoyed with his 2017 costume.

I am extremely disappointed because now I have to pay to ship this stupid useless thing back in order to get a refund. Buyer beware!

I am a women's size 10 normally, so I ordered 10.5. The fit is small, I would never wear regular shoes this small. But I know that rock climbing shoes are supposed to be very tight (they're supposed to make your toes curl), which is why I ordered the 10.5 knowing they would be slightly uncomfortable from the reviews. They're as small as I can go without being very uncomfortable, so I'm pretty satisfied. I don't wear socks in them *gross*, if you're planning to wear socks then you'll probably want to go a little bigger. Overall: They are the fit I expected after reading reviews and knowing about climbing shoes. Going up 1/2 size worked for me. They seem like they are made out of good material. They have worked very well for me so far. I chose them because they looked like they're not made of leather, and they are not! I don't like to wear shoes made of skin.
summary: Climbing shoes are supposed to be very small, but you still should probably go up a half size

reviewText: All Mordenmiss clothing is top notch in style and quality. Very impressive. Also, the company aims to please. However, the clothing is not made for the average built American female. It's way too small. Based on the Asian body, the clothing not only doesn't fit the American woman, it tends to take away her confidence because...let's face it...what female wants to feel 'too big'!!when trying on stylish clothing. reviewText:
I really really like this maxi. It's very well made. The top is but sheer. So just mindful of that. I'm short so it's a bit long. I did size up. A lot of times I order and it's not US sizing. It fit well maybe not as tight as it could of. But I wasn't uncomfortable. It's a great summer outfit!
*I received this product for a discount in exchange for my honest unbiased review

This dress is simply perfect. I love the way it fits - I'm 5'9" and 129 pounds and it fits flawlessly. The fabric is pretty soft and you can't beat the price. I was a little scared to order a long maxi dress online but I'm SO glad that I took the chance. Its perfect. Oh, the picture shows a belt but mine didn't come with one, which is fine.

This dress has a very flattering cut.  It flares out a bit at the bottom and the horizontal striping on the sides is a nice accent.  The attached tank is a nice, silkier type material.  The skirt portion is a little more stiff, but still pretty comfortable.  I ordered a medium and it's a bit smaller than I feel it should be.  The material is quite stretchy though.  This dress is versatile -- can be left alone and worn with flip flops for a super casual look, or dressed up a bit.  You could certainly wear a jacket or something over the top as well.

One of the things I was worried about given the price point is that the stripes might not match up well like they should, but it's actually made quite well.

Like you, I rely on reviews when selecting products to purchase. As a product tester, I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for providing an honest review, but this review is based solely on the merits of this product itself; any discount I may have received has no bearing on my assessment and evaluation of it.
summary: Very flattering cut!  Can be worn casually or dressed up a bit.

reviewText: I really love this blouse. It is professional and good to wear to work but it's also cute and stylish. It fit perfect and is true to size.

The item comes in a plastic bag. The item comes with tags. On the tags are the cleaning instructions for the item, which is real helpful. The tag also provides proper use and care for the item. It is worth noting that there are restrictions on this item. The item is dry clean only as well as to keep away from flames as I think the mesh can burn in the see through regions. This is common to all products with mesh.

I had ordered one size up based on the size chart I had seen on this item in the product description. The item is in accordance with this size chart. The item is a bit short in length but is dependent upon your height as well. It is a bit loose at the shoulders as well but can be slightly tight around the bust. But its based on each women and their bust size and shoulder length so use the chart to make your purchase. But overall the fitting was good.

The mesh part of the item is a bit rough but since its mesh it will be rough. The nonmesh region is softer to the tough and thicker. The item comes with buttons as well to adjust the amount of buttons needed and for ease of wearing. I ordered the black version so they are all black buttons and one button in pearl color.

Overall, I would recommend this item as my wife liked it and was reasonably priced. Its a different style of wearing clothing and is nice to wear in summer months where it can be hot and also allows your skin to breathe through the mesh.

I have received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review for the product. I am in no way affiliated with the seller or product. I write reviews based on previous experience with similar products. I hope you find this review helpful

reviewText: Beautifull and sexy look !

Chase Secret Womens Casual Crochet Off Shoulder Blouse Shirt Top Blue X-large I took a chance and bought this top for my wife and she just loves it...already has another, of a different color, on the way. I was a bit leery and got it one size larger and it fits perfectly. S that being said , they seem to run a little small which might be prefered by some women who like a more form-fitting top. The lace looks and feels high qualityas does the rest of the blouse. The bare shoulders is a plus and the lace is just enough to help conceal bra straps. Wife says she will wash by hand and rack dry. I received this product well packaged and damage-free. It arrived on-time as well. In my experiences with products shipped by Amazon, this seems to be the norm. Review disclaimer: I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review, and, as with all such review items, I used it long enough to get a feel for how good, bad or mediocre it is. If it seems that I only give 4 or 5 stars on my reviews it's because I tend to review only the 4-5 star items, which is why my reviews of samples tend to lean a little higher. I will often use a product for a number of weeks or a month, in order to learn its operation and get a feel of its longevity. I'm always open to questions in the comments section about it. I take pride in my reviewing process and hope it helps one in making a decision. I don't do the technical evaluations on a product, I'll leave that to the tech guys. I tend to choose to review products that I actually want and that I will use on a daily basis so that I can provide a thorough and honest feedback on the product. If this review has been of any help in decision making, please vote YES below. Thanks for your time.
summary: very nice, affordable top for all occasions...

Full disclosure up front: I purchased this item at a discounted price in exchange for an honest, unbiased review.
So, here it is: There are pros and cons to this purchase.
Pros:
Shipping was SUPER FAST for what they predicted...said it would take a month and a half to be delivered...and I was expecting maybe a week or so early at best...it was delivered about 2 and 1/2 weeks after purchasing it. So that's awesome.
Next, I wondered if the dress might shrink and given these Asian dress sizes can already run a little small, I asked the seller a day after purchasing if I would be best washing it in cold or warm water and could it handle a dryer? I got a timely response the next day to 'please not wash in hot water.'  Though concise, it didn't really address my whole concern. Thinking I had much more time, I forgot about it and figured if care instructions weren't on the item, I would then ask for clarification since the reply was nice and quick.

Now for the Cons:
So, being that this item normally sells for nearly $20 I was expecting a sort of thick "business/office" worthy material. Instead, once I opened the package, I quickly realized that the black material is super thin...almost like the material that most kids' Halloween costumes are made of...kind of silky thin like something you'd normally make a cape from...not a dress. The cuffs and collar on the other hand, are this stiff polyester almost material like some dress jacket from the 1960's...they don't match the weight of the black material which is so light so the cuffs and collar feel like accessories instead of part of the dress. Side note- the dress also had a strong chemical smell that Asian-based merchant's clothes can sometimes have. (not a fan of that smell..it's rare, but once you experience it you'll prefer not to again)
It was also surprisingly a little big, though truth be told, I do have a thin torso. For reference, I'm 5'5'' and weigh 118 lbs with 34A up top. I ordered a medium thinking it would probably be snug. Not the case! It is comfortable in the arms, but the sleeves are a little too long and the middle is a bit wide...kinda makes me look boxy.
Now for the real truth about it, sure it's comfortable in that some ninja-turtle/superman kind of onesie costumes sometimes are. The main issue is that the dress LOOKS like a costume. It doesn't look like something you'd pay almost $20 for. I've ordered some pretty cheap dresses from Asian-originating merchants before and this is so cheap compared to what I expected. I am pretty disappointed as I really wanted a cute business dress and instead got a cheap costume for the next time I decide to dress up like "Wednesday" from the Addams Family.
summary: Pro's and Con's - Ultimately Not Worth the Money

reviewText: poor quality

The fabric on this dress is every bit as pretty as it looks in the pictures. The silhouette is nice too - I figure any time you wear something that really hugs the figure (and this one does!) you need to cover up a bit more in other areas, so the high neck and knee length give it the balance it needs.  The neck is not a problem to get in and out of as the fabric has a good amount of stretch to it.  Because it is so clingy and has a good amount of stretch to it, you would be safe sizing up.  I am 5'8 and think that the length on this is great.  Just to the knee.  The fabric is very thin, and while it clings to the figure nicely, it also will show every line of anything you're wearing under it.  I am running large in the bust area right now because I just had a baby and would recommend the size L for no larger than a C cup, again due to the thin fabric, if you are much larger than that it will stretch the fabric out enough so the pattern doesn't look right.  One star off because I don't believe this will be a long-term item as far as durability goes, and because it takes a really long time to ship as it arrives from China. reviewText:
This dress is elegant! It can be worn to the office, church, party, etc.

Overall: The fabric is soft and has a little stretch so it is comfortable to wear. It says it is a cotton/polyester but it feels almost like silk. It is well constructed and the design is very flattering. There are some difference between the dress I got and the picture on amazon. First, the black lace is not the same. The lace on mine was not as tall so the black pleated waist is higher than I expected. It is not a bad thing, just different than I expected. Second, the picture of the back looked like there was a white zipper down into the black area. There is no zipper on the dress so there is not white in the black section of the dress. A definite plus in my book.

Cost: This dress is just over $20 when you add in shipping. That is an amazing price for any dress let alone this beautiful one.

Washing: I don't love hand washing clothing. But for this dress it is worth it. It only took a few minutes and then I let it dry over night. And no ironing needed! That is another positive.

Sizing : Using the size chart link's measurements I was able to pick the size that fit my body perfectly. I am 5 foot 10 inches and this dress does indeed hit me at the knee.

Recommend?: Yes. It is a quality and beautiful dress!

-- I received a discount on this dress with the aim to ascertain the features and drawbacks that may help you ultimately decide if it fits your needs. I understand how important honest reviews are to help us research the products we would like, so I will always give my honest opinion.

This is a beautiful dress, very fitted, the material is a thin silky material, not a cotton.  The overall look of the dress is very nice for work or just to dress up.  I purchased this item at a discount for the purpose of review.

I think the quality of this is fine for the price. The fabric is extremely stretchy and although the collar was snug around my neck it wasn't tight, it was just formal. It looks alright, but I found that it fit a little smaller than I'm used to. I was hoping it wasn't asian sizing, and it's not quite asian sizing, but it was definitely snug. I'm usually a 1x in forever 21 items with stretch and a 2x in items with less stretch, but I think for this dress to fit and be appropriate for work, which is why I purchased it, I would need a 3 or 4x.

But if you're willing to order a size or two up, I find the quality to be fine. The arms were snug, but not constricting, even though I have large arms. It has a lot of stretch and hugs curves well.

I originally purchased this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review, but the company isn't even asking me for a review anymore, they cancelled that. I'm just reviewing it now for your info.
summary: Order a size or two up. Lots of stretch though.

This is a lightweight, semi-sheer top that fits much more like a blouse in length than a dress. The polyester fabric *will* dry quickly, which would make for a good swimsuit coverup, but it does not cover my rear end at all (Im 56 and average build). The color is vibrant and what I expected based on the image in the product listing.

The detailing at the neck adds interest, but it does not lie flat and has a protruding knot that cannot be removed at one spot. The blouse is surged, but had a knot of threading at the neck seam--I was able to snip most of it off. The fringe around the edges and bottom does coordinate with the neck detail. It has a couple spots of imperfection as well. And the stitching to make the arms is a single row of stitches that ends in a knotted mass of thread on one side.

This top could definitely work as a cover up, but at just shy of $17, I would expect a little more care to detail. And Im a bit confused because right in the product listing it states: Sold only by TXZTrade, other sellers are fake. Please note it and don¡t be deceived! That is not the name of the seller from whom I received this product. Nor is it the name on the tag stitched at the neck. I have no idea if I received an authentic garment or not, but this one is not very good quality, and I will not be keeping it.

reviewText:
This is so nice and lightweight, it is perfect for the summer weather. It looks really cute on. I've worn it with both a knee length dress and a tank top and leggings and it really accommodates the lights nicely. It fit just as expected and the colors look just like they are shown. I thought since it doesn't have sleeves that it may fall off my shoulders especially while chasing a toddler, but it stays on nicely. I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants a cute outfit accessory or swimsuit cover up. It's very high quality.

I rely on Amazon reviews for all my purchases, regardless of where I end up making my purchase. I also understand the importance of accuracy regarding reviews. It is my objective to help others in making an informed, educated buying decision. That being said, I did received this product for a discount in an exchange of my review. This opinion is all my own and I do not gain anything from leaving a positive review and lose nothing by leaving a negative one.

I absolutely love this coverup, you could even call it a wrap or kimono because it can be worn so many ways and is very versatile. The material is not really chiffon, it actually reminds me of a very soft rayon bathrobe material. It is not sheer. If you are concerned about the 'one size fits all' of this item, it measures 32.5" long, and the overall width is 42" wide. The coverup is made to drape over your shoulders, it is all one piece without separate sleeves so to speak. If this bothers you a simple fix could be to add a small stitch in the middle of it to secure the front and back together, but I wore this all day yesterday draped over a pair of skinny jeans and a white tank top, and it did not bother me at all wearing it this way, just draped over my shoulders. I am 5'7, and weigh around 170lbs, and this is plenty loose on me. Normally I'd wear a Large or XL in tops.

This item is so versatile, you can wear it over a swimsuit, over shorts and a tank or over a dress. I have added two photos of two different ways I have already styled it. Over a white wrap-front top with distressed denim shorts, and over a flowy black dress with a strappy bralette underneath. The pattern looks like the photo, but keep in mind this is a hand-wash garment, so either hand wash or maybe washing in a mesh delicates bag on extra gentle may work as well...then hang to dry. Quality wise, all the stitching seems to be secure, and although it was really wrinkled upon arrival, there were no loose threads, holes, rips or defects. I would say the quality would be similar to a F21 item, maybe a little nicer. I hung this up in the bathroom with me while I took a shower and a lot of the wrinkles came out thanks to the steam. I'm not sure if you can iron it because I think the fabric is rayon.

Although I purchased this at a discounted price and agreed to test the product and leave an honest review, these opinions are totally mine based on my own experience with and assessment of the product. Thanks.

So, I received this sexy and soft lingerie robe and boy-short cheeky panty. I ordered the blue in X-Large. It came in a sealed bag from the manufacturer. Looks exactly like the Amazon photos.

The robe comes with a matching lace cheeky panty. It has a removable belt that goes through two belt loops at the side of the robe. The blue shade is absolutely beautiful, it truly is. I am glad I got blue as I have enough black in my wardrobe. I may wear this as a swimsuit cover up, I think it would look cute over a bikini.

For reference, I am 118 pounds, 5 ft. 4 in., 34C bust. I got the X-Large size 8-10. I must admit I was expecting the robe to be a little bigger. I can 'just' close the robe and overlap it together all the way but that is ok because I just tie it sort of loosely wrapped closed. The robe and panty have the most beautiful lace. The quality is there. I have taken pics to show this. The robe is sheer and the turquoise blue shade is just so pretty. I am very happy with my purchase.

reviewText:
A very well made swimsuit that fits just as you would expect! Most women know the struggles of finding that perfect swimsuit...they have to fit you just right, and usually when you put them on the end result is less than desirable. That was definitely not the case with this one, which pleasantly surprised me given the excellent price!
This suit looks just as it does in the photos. The material is thicker than many suits in its price range and form fitting...stretchy. It ties both behind the neck as well as the back and this is very adequate support. The breasts have a medium padding in them which really helps to accentuate your bosom, without making them look too huge. Ooh lala! The rear doesn't ride too high, which I've found to be a problem with cut out suits in the past. While swimming the suit keeps me in place nicely. I wash with like colors and then hang dry and it has retained its shape nicely. The gold accents at the neck are a little cheap looking, but definitely not worth skipping the suit over.  5 stars from me.

Sample provided for evaluation

It fits really nicely and looks great. My wife loves wearing it and I think it looks great on her. Now that the weather is nice we will be able to start going swimming again and put it to good use. Full disclosure, we received one of these discounted in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I had spotted a similar tie at a cute boutique shop a few months ago, but it was going for over $50! My husband couldn't bear to buy a tie for that much, so I am glad I was able to order this for him at a fraction of that price! The quality of this tie is stellar, it does not bunch up when you try to tie it, and if you happen to dirty it (trust me, a genuine concern because this is something that happens frequently with my husband), you don't have to worry about washing this tie, unlike silk ties! I really like cotton ties because it's got a preppy, younger feel compared to silk ties. I know my husband likes to diversify his tie collection. He was so happy with this purchase and told me to order more from this company! We will definitely be coming back to them for future purchases :)

I purchased this tie in a blue with small skulls and stars on it. Not a typical pattern for a tie, but I thought it would be a cute gift for mu neurosurgeon boyfriend. He has to wear a tie to see patients in his clinic, and I thought this would be kind of fun and might make his patients smile.

The tie is a really nice shade of light blue. It looks nice with many of his dress shirts, whether blue or white (they'r almost all a shade of blue, its his favorite color!). I think it might look nice with pink too...now to convince him to try a pink shirt!  I have to say the tie is much skinnier than most of his other ties. I was a little worried about this because  am not usually a fan of skinny ties. I was pleasantly surprised by how much I liked it when he put it on. It didn't look too skinny on, and he was really happy.

The tie seems to be  a pretty good quality cotton tie. The stitching seems strong, as does the material. It doesn't look look cheap, which is always a worry when buying a tie you don't see in person first, especially when you are buying online. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase.

I received this product at a discount in return for an honest review. The above is my opinion of the product based on my personal use.

reviewText:
Pros:
I love this pack so much!  I use it nearly every single day!  I bought one at a retail store several years ago and didn't realize how much I'd be using it.  Searched for more several times but could never find any.  Finally found them here and was super excited to order a couple more!  It's perfect size to hold my iPhone 7 in the zipper compartment.  I keep my credit cards and moola in a small binder in the Velcro pouch in front.  I don't usually carry a purse anymore - I just bring a nylon shopping-type bag with me, along with this small pack and pull it out when I go into stores.  On another important note: the larger zipper compartment is big enough to hold my 380 hand gun when I'm at the ranch.

Cons: (Why I gave 4 stars and not 5)
* The elastic band seems to start coming apart more quickly than expected.  However, it looks like it would be easy to repair if necessary.
* I wish they'd made the front compartment with a zipper as well to secure the contents better.  I've never had anything fall out of it, but it would give me more peace of mind if it zipped.
summary: Perfect size to hold a 380 or smartphone!

Corsets are expensive and I didn't expect this one to be so nice! It is fully boned and even includes a panel of matching fabric behind the lacing so there is not a gap. I have ordered other corsets in this price range (under $20) and have never before received one this nicely made. The eyelets are secured within the layers of fabric, the boning is completely covered with padded fabric and does not show any signs of poking through. The inside is soft and free of itchy threads or seams. The ribbon is strong enough that when I cinch the heck out of my waist, it does not appear to be straining or in danger of ripping.

I am 56 and currently about 135 lbs. My bust and waist measurements did not line up with the sizing chart very well, so I contacted the seller for a recommendation on size. After discussing my sizing with the seller, I ordered the size Medium, figuring I could use the ribbon to loosen and tighten as needed. I probably could have ordered the large, but this medium will be perfect when I finally lose my 5-10 pounds that Im working on. I have previously ordered corsets that were too large and there is simply no way to tighten them enough to look right, so I would rather err on the slightly tight side.

I am thoroughly pleased with this corset, and I would absolutely recommend it.

I received this corset for free in exchange for my honest review. I did not receive any other compensation, and I am not obligated to write a favorable review. I have used this product myself, and all words in this review are my own.

I'm super satisfied not only with the product but even more with the customer service!!! Great quality but I received the wrong size so I contacted the seller. They told me I didn't have to ship it back but that they would issue me a code so I could order the correct one. I think that's awesome. I mean, I would've returned it but it probably costs more that way. I appreciate that I didn't have to fight for fairness and I did order the correct size. I'm very happy as the quality feels great and the colors are beautiful! Very satisfied!

reviewText:
i received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. I was not influenced by anyone in any way.

This extraordinary pink satin corset fully laceable back, sturdy metal clasps in front and a flattering sweetheart cut with a frill at the bust. You will also receive a matching g-string.

Super cute and super sexy. Very soft material. Soft elegant satin ties, These can be worn for personal at home for romance or if you are into cosplay this would perfect. It fits comfortably. You can loosen or tighten as needed. There are many colors to choose from. My daughter wanted pink, so I got this for her. I think it's more for her age any way (laugh out loud). This can also be worn though to keep in some of the bulges. Just tighten it up a bit and you are good to go.

 WHAT IS A CORSET?
A corset is a garment worn to hold and train the torso into a desired shape for aesthetic or medical purposes (either for the duration of wearing it or with a more lasting effect). Both men and women are known to wear corsets, though women more commonly do. The most common and well-known use of corsets is to slim the body and make it conform to a fashionable silhouette. To emphasize a curvy figure. They reduce the waist which exaggerates the bust and hips.

 WHAT IS A BUSTIER?
A bustier is a form-fitting garment for women, which is traditionally worn as lingerie.  You can also wear it as a push-up bra under a low-backed dress, or as a camisole for outerwear. The bustier can also be worn as a half-slip under sheer upper garments if a bold display of the midriff.

 OVERALL: it's an adorable corset beautiful corset that is designed to help achieve the much sought after hourglass figure, while help the wearer look fabulous. It's definitely affordable. And being a good buy, I do recommend it.
summary: The perfect corset to get the attention you deserve!

reviewText: These were difficult to get adjusted -- I purchased them for my elderly father who has trouble with his laces.  Once I had them all adjusted, I had him try them.  The first thing that happened while he was putting them on was his left shoe got too close to the right one and the right and left snapped together, basically tying his shoes together!  I had visions of him slipping on his shoes and forgetting to do the magnets and then getting his shoelaces "tied together" on his first step, so I removed them immediately and I'm searching for something that is velcro-based.
summary: Don't work that great and could be dangerous.

All that was on my mind was that my shoes took too long to put on and I needed something to make that process quick and easy. Lets start off by the build quality of this product. I was really surprise that these magnets are like super magnets, they keep your shoes really tight. The process of putting the shoes on and through the laces was a bit different, but once I did one shoe, the 2nd shoe was a breeze. Slipping into your shoes with these is easy. Unhook the magnet, slip your foot it, then hook magnet, thats it. The way my shoes are is I keep the 3 lace rows in the front how they were and the 3 top lace rows inside the magnets. No issue with this product and with a week of use I've had no issue and still have tight laces.

This intricate necklace seems to be well made, and I especially like that it isn't large/gaudy costume jewelry, like so much of what is on amazon. Further, I like how this isn't plated, as such micron-thin plating wears through in minutes The pendant is just a bit smaller than a dime in size and arrived in a bright pinkish and dark purple gift box. The clasp looks like it will hold up, and the necklace catches light well. My only critique is that the peripheral cubic zirconias are so small that they aren't very visible. It looks almost like the metal is just bent and shiny on the six peripheral petals. Overall I'm a big fan though =).

reviewText: I received this at a discount for an honest review. I am extremely happy with my purchase. I had never purchased jewelry online before. I was very skeptical. I'm glad I followed through with my instinct and went on with my purchase. I love this necklace! The chain is a box chain, very sturdy not flimsy. The word "love" is also a sturdy charm, not hollow. The stones are nice and bright, not dull looking. It sits about 1 1/2 inch below my collar bone. I wore my "Love" style necklace last night to an event with some of my husband's clients and received tons of compliments for it. I would definitely recommend this necklace to anyone. 5 stars from me!

I wish I could give more stars on this one! My package arrived very fast with no damage. Upon opening it, I was happily surprised to see the romantic velvet and ribbon clad jewelry box that held the necklace. When I saw the necklace online, it was so pretty I just had to have it. So, when I opened the box to see it, I couldn't believe how much more beautiful the necklace actually was in reality. In a word, stunning. The "Love" charm was domed and polished to a perfect silvery shine, the stones look flawless with the light fragmenting into what seems like a thousand bright shimmers, and the chain is so delicate it just quietly screams class. The four leaf clover is just too charming. The end of the chain has several rings making it possible to adjust the wear length easily. I instantly considered the versatility of this necklace and its adjusting length to be worn with many different wardrobe pieces from collar to bare neck. I really loved this so much, I couldn't make myself keep it for myself. I gifted it to my mother for Mother's Day. Good call because she loved it, too! I do have plans to buy another for myself though just as soon as I can. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my own honest review.

reviewText:
This necklace arrived right on time and came in a nice burgundy and pink velvet gift box. I debated for a long time whether to go for this piece or not. There are two things that drew me to it...actually 3.  First, the dangling crystal is a pretty shade of orange, which is my favorite color. Second, the word 'Miss'. I think it's a bit peculiar for a necklace to have such a design but it appealed because I have this thing about being called Ma'am. Where I work, I get called Ma'am half the time and while I realize it's a normal greeting not meant to be offensive, in my mind I'm saying "No, I'm not a Ma'am, I am a Miss!"  I'm also unmarried so I guess I'm a Miss in that way as well. At any rate, it's just a little peeve of mine. So I found it amusing to find a necklace that reads Miss and has an attractive orange crystal. The third reason? It's sterling silver. I try to get my silver jewelry in sterling whenever possible.

So that's what drew me to the necklace. Upon opening the box, I was surprised at how dainty it is. In my mind I was envisioning it as being a bit larger. Anyone considering this item should take careful note of the size. I should've paid more attention. I still like it. It's not that I'm not a dainty girl per se. I like all sorts of jewelry from the delicate to the large 'Look at Me!' pieces. I just had to adjust my perception of it. It's dainty and it sparkles nicely. The silver, including the chain, has a nice shine to it. The crystal is lovely. The chain is sterling silver as well and has an extender on it to adjust for length. I'll have to be careful with this one as this looks like the kind of chain that might tangle easily. But it's suitable to the pendant. It's the crystal I like best. It catches the light and is a pretty color. This is a piece that makes me feel very feminine, just like a Miss should feel :)

Overall, I do like this necklace and appreciate the quality of it. I'm still glad I went for it, even though it's a bit different than I envisioned. It has a lot more sparkle and shine in person than it does in the picture.

Disclosure; I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Smaller Than Expected But Still Nice

Here is a break down on how I determine my star rating of a product:

5 stars  I love it! It is awesome and I highly recommend everyone to purchase this product!
4 stars  I like it, but there are some flaws. Don't we all have flaws? I would purchase again.
3 stars - It was okay, but I would probably not buy it again unless there are no other options.
2 stars  There may be worse products out there, but you can definitely find better choices.
1 star  I dislike the product, I wish I had not purchased it and recommend others to not purchase.

Nice sturdy quality. Color is not as rosy as I imagined but still very shiny, smooth, and attractive. Some other commenters have said that the edges were sharp but I did not have this issue at all. I like that you can sort of bend the metal a bit to fit better even though the metal is strong, and it stays in shape once you've bent it without seeming to weaken. The shape is like the picture on the person's arm, kind of loose and bangle-like. The three bands that came with the bracelet were good quality with no metal parts, I got one black one and two pink. The box it all came in was a nice touch. The only downsides are that the bottom of the groove has a weird texture left over from tooling it, I suppose, and that the hair band comes loose from the groove a few times a day and slips off to just be on my wrist. I would have liked it if the groove was a little deeper. Overall it was what I expected and I am happy I bought it.

Size wise it fits perfectly. Length wise not so much. This top is very much on the short side. I don't know if I received a petite size or not, but it is a bit short for my torso. I'm about 5'8" and average weight the picture shows the top as ending past your waist almost to the top of your hips. My top ended just past my belly button. I will have to wear a tank top under so that my behind is not to on display if I bend down.  I can only recommend this to a petite person. I gave it 5 stars because it is a very comfortable and soft top, also very light. I live in the sunshine state where temperatures tend to be 90 degrees and above for nine to ten months out of the year it would have been a perfect match for me.

reviewText: This shirts design is very pretty, I'm giving it 4 stars because of the somewhat small size issue. The top of the shirt fits acuratly, but the bottom narrows. The material is true to color, a little on the thi size and contains no "stretch or give" for anyone looking for a super comfy fit. The shirt is also delicately made so follow the wash and dry guidelines. I've warn the shirt it wears nicely and has received compliments! The size is really my only concern. I bought the largest size, but true to American sizes I am more of a 10-12 than a 12-14 and this shirt fits snugly around the waist/hips. And why this shirt did not receive 5 stars. reviewText: This is a very cute shirt and allows for coverage of areas a lot of women have self-image concerns.  One thing I wished what that it was just a little bit longer in length because I have a large bust and it barely came down to my jeans after going over my bust.  I ordered a medium and that is what I usually wear.  I am not sure if I order a larger size if it would make a difference in length or just make it bagging viewing from the side.  I did like the shirt design though.  Not found of calling it Batwing sleeves.  It has very nice lace sleeves and was very flattering everywhere else.  I also am not a fan of the material...it is the polyester/rayon type that wrinkles ease and if you drop anything on it, even water it is there for the rest of the day and wiping it with water doesn't help, just makes a larger stain area until it is washed again.  I feel the design is a good concept with a few tweaks.  I think the fit is better suited for a shorter torso with a smaller bust.  I think body type makes a huge difference in how much someone likes this product.  I did receive this shirt at a discounted rate for my honest, unbiased review.

reviewText: Great product, I use them with riding my motorcycle at night. No problems fitting in a full size helmet. These glasses really help reduce the glare on these newer vehicles with HID headlights. Highly recommend
I did not like the fit

The frames are precisely manufactured. Each arm and padded temple are perfectly level when setting the sunglasses on a table, and both arm hinges open exactly the same amount. The nose arms are equally precise. A really nice heavy duty padded case was an added surprise -- every bit as nice as the sunglasses themselves! I bought these sunglasses primarily for driving at night in order to cut down the glare from oncoming car headlights, and in particular the brilliant blue aftermarket headlights which some people use. The real kicker is that these amber polarized sunglasses are extraordinarily effective in daytime, both outdoors and while driving. I can't believe how well they eliminate brilliant blue glare from the sky and from sunlight reflected off of cars and car windshields! I don't have to squint my eyes at all when using these sunglasses. Driving in direct sunlight and then under overpasses or into tunnels is a pleasure since my eyes can instantly adjust to the much lower lighting conditions under overpasses or when entering tunnels. Conventional neutral transmission polarized sunglasses usually are just too dark and usually must be quickly removed when transitioning from driving in sunlight to driving under wide overpasses or into tunnels, but not so with these amber sunglasses. This is the first time that I have tried high quality amber polarized sunglasses. I am sold on the concept and its effectiveness. If you do a lot of city driving and frequently drive under wide overpasses and through tunnels, then these or similar amber polarized sunglasses are a "must have" item.
summary: Excellent quality sunglasses which are excellent for day and night driving.

I bought 5 different sets of packing cubes to compare them all. I'll compare them to each other. I'll rank them in the order of the ones I liked most to least. THIS PARTICULAR SET RANKED #1. #1 Milaca (Honeybee) - (6 Pc set) This one is the lightest by far. It has three large ripstop nylon cubes for packing with breathable mesh, and two laundry bags (all nylon, no mesh). The cubes are deep enough for 3-4 shirts or 2-3 jeans. #2 PRO Packing Cubes - (4 Pc Set) This one is the same brand as #3, but it has larger bags than #3. It is also made of ripstop nylon and has breathable mesh. It is a bit heavier than #1 and the seams are not as sturdy as #1. It also smells bad, but I think it will go away if you let it air out for a couple of weeks. The cubes are more shallow than #1 by about a third. #3 Pro Packing Cubes - (5 Pc MEDIUM Set) This one has the same comments as #2, except smaller cubes. Maybe this is preferable to you, but I am a 6'3" guy with big clothes, and I don't want to have to fold them 6 times to fit them in the cube. #4 Yepal - (3 Pc Set) Another ripstop nylon set of cubes. These are light like #1 with breathable mesh. The seams are similar to #2 and #3, which means they are less well made than the seams of #1. The main problem with these packing cubes is that they are very small, and they are all double sided, so each cube has zippers on both sides with a compartment half as shallow as the cube. I probably can just jam one shirt into each side. Maybe they're good for socks and undies, but why are they all cut in half? Bad idea, IMO. Also, backside compartments of the cubes do not have breathable mesh. #5 Hynes Eagle (4 Pc Set) with Toiletry Bag These cubes are the most well made of all of them. A higher quality nylon, and excellent seams. However what I don't like is that they are the heaviest, and they do not have a breathable mesh. Maybe the lack of mesh is an advantage to you, but I like the mesh because it keeps the clothes from getting musty. They do have well made air ports on the sides so the bags don't get pressurized. They have clear material on the tops that allow you to see what is inside each cube. Also the toiletry bag is not well designed. It's small and, while it has a nice hanger, it would be hard to use because there are too many small pockets. Lots of material and not a lot of space or accessibility. I bought all of these packing cubes with discounts in return for honest reviews.
summary: Best set of packing cubes of the five I ordered.

reviewText:
This is a good purchase, if you're looking for a very basic set of packing cubes at a fair price. I was able to stuff well over one week's worth of clothing within the three main compartments (Large compartment - 1pair Jeans, 1pair sweatpants, 1 hoodie, 2pair shorts. Medium Compartment - several shirts and Small - socks and underwear. It does feel like the zippers on each compartment are fairly weak and could break if you're just a little too forceful with them. The separate pouches for laundry are nice to have. And everything fit fairly easily into my carry on size suitcase. They should work for a similarly sized backpack too.  Overall, I'm satisfied.

Full disclosure - I did receive this item at a discounted price in exchange for my review.
summary: Decent Set of Cubes but Zipper Quality is a little Suspect

reviewText:
Updated 7-13-16:  These cubes held up very well after a trip to Italy.  Yes, the zippers are a bit flimsy.  But, after two weeks of packing and unpacking and then another trip a few weeks ago, these held up beautifully.  I love the different sized laundry pouches, I've used them for more than that including toiletries.

These glasses are not polarized -- despite claims online and also printed on the inventory sticker on the box -- and I have been cheated by this similar false claims on Amazon so many times that I am beginning to think this is intentional criminal behavior.

Amazon staff, vendor staff, do you pay attention to these reviews? This is STEALING. You are willfully advertising an item for sale, accepting money for it, and then providing an inferior product!

You can't just click your heels together, keep repeating "These glasses are polarized, these glasses are polarized," and expect them to magically become polarized! It can't happen that way. There is real physics involved. Physics!

I posted previously on a similar pair of night driving glasses from another purchase:

These are NOT polarized lenses, and I am disappointed in the supplier and Amazon for advertising them as such. This is is deceptive, time-consuming, and costly to handle.

There's a very easy test for polarized lenses:

1. Hold the lens over an LCD display so that you can read the LCD. A wristwatch (remember those?) works great.

2. Rotate the lens 90 degrees.

3. If the lens is polarized, the LCD display will go black. If you can still read the LCD, then the lens is NOT polarized.

These "Night Vision" glasses FAIL that test. These are not polarized, as advertised, and the trouble to return them costs me more time and effort than they are worth.

Wake up, Amazon! You can do better than this! It's the 3rd or 4th time in the past 2 years that you've sold me stuff that's clearly not advertised truthfully, and in each case it's been easy to check beforehand.

I am very, very disappointed
summary: NOT POLARIZED. Repeated deceptive advertising should be grounds for legal action.

reviewText:
Performance:
I was tremendously disappointed with the performance of these lenses.  They are basically just slightly-yellow tinted glass (I did verify that it is polarized, but it was no help).  I was expecting the lenses to help filter glare and allow better detailed visibility during the night (or day) similar to my ski goggles, but that is not what I got. The glare from the Xenon Halogen Lights was not attenuated - it was just yellow now, not blue; the details of the road were not any better (I cycled the glasses on/off - no difference other than yellow, not yellow); arguably the details were worse as the glass caused some distortion as my eyes swept across the lenses - ultimately I ended up with a bit of headache from wearing them.  I would NOT recommend these as they missed the mark on performance completely.

Delivery and Condition of Product:
The packaging for these glasses was impressive and comparable to much higher end products.  It comes with a beautiful travel case and glass cleaning wipes.  The glasses themselves are covered up in plastic protection pieces to indicate they are handled with care.  My glasses had fingerprints on the lenses, but they cleaned up quickly (I didn't run them through AFIS).  All other aspects of the glasses were in good shape.

Design:
The physical design of the glasses is great.  Fairly rugged design, feels solid.  They look cool and fit my face well.
summary: Disappointing Performance - Missed the Mark.  Great frame Design.

reviewText: I am in love with this shirt.  I honestly got it for Halloween as in undershirt to my corset, but when I felt just how amazing it was to wear and how great it looked? The buttons add just the right amount of desired (or undesired) cleavage and make it a nice shirt for any occasion since it has a rather sleek look that I think makes it slip just out of the edge of "casual wear".

This is a great little cover up. I love the print. I love the color. I like how light and easy to wear this is. However, I found that despite ordering a size up, that it is a little narrow and I could not completely close the front. I purchased this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased review. My words and opinions are completely my own and were not influenced by the discount I received.

This is a cute wrap for summer. It's very light weight, and almost completely sheer. I have several heavier boho kimino cardigans, but I live in Arizona and for the hot months I just want something that can keep the sun off my skin a bit without actually adding any layers of hot extra clothing. It's also a good bridge piece for crop tops since it covers you up a bit but lets a bit of skin show through.

This was sold as a one size fits all, and although I'm sure that's not exactly true, it is cut very loosely and would probably be comfortable on most average sized women. I'm 5'4" 120lbs and usually wear a size 4 US. The top could probably be belted into a very short dress length on me, hitting at about mid thigh (although again, it's sheer). The print is a light gray on turquoise and is a slightly cute, slightly cliche southwestern cow skull, feather motif that I can never decide if I find charming or irritating when it comes to boho fashion, but it's subtle at least and the colors are great so I'm just going to embrace my own kitchiness I guess.

I'm posting the picture of the back, since when I got it I had no idea the cow skull was there and figure some other people might share my tendency towards finding it cheesy. Still, compared to the "Aztec" and "Navajo" are not those things at all (I live in Navajo country and fake Navajo designs are especially bleh) this one is pretty benign. Just, you know, maybe a bit more faux west then I was intending.

Tastes vary! Also, like everything listed as chiffon on here, it's polyester, although I'm glad for that, because who would want an easily wrinkled up possible swimsuit coverup to be made out of chiffon the most hard to care for fabric ever?

I got this kimono top at a reduced price in exchange for my honest review, and I'm sorry for the dissertation on tacky designs in the middle. At least it's honest.
summary: Really pretty color, wish I had seen the back design before buying.

reviewText:
Considering I just bought these, I will post another review after I have worn them a bunch of times. So far, I have worn them 3 times. I don't dress up for work every day, but when I have client meetings, I try to look the part. I am very particular about my appearance, and do not like to look dis-shelved. I bought another set of shirt stays, from a different company, about a year ago, and two of the four have broken at the clasp. So I am trying this brand.

The shirt stays do match the exact appearance and description given by the page. The thing I like best about these stays is that they still have the rubber clasp. I like this for two reasons. 1, so that it doesn't destroy my shirts. 2, so it reduces the chances of it pulling off my shirt mid-day and then just hanging down by my sock.

I was surprised by how heavy duty they were when I took them out of the box. These are no typical elastic material. It was almost "jean like" in feel and density. I thought for sure it would chafe me, or be too stiff on my legs and cause irritation. I was wrong. Not a single problem. Except when my boxer briefs ride up mid day, the metal clasp will pinch my leg. But this can be easily solved by re-adjusting my shorts, or by buying longer length boxer briefs.

I prefer the 4 individual straps to the Y-straps or the stirrup-straps simply due to sheer versatility. I have used the Y-straps in the past, and depending on the shirt, I find that I cannot position the clasps in such a way to simply keep the s*** from riding up. It always seems to pull my shirts towards the outer sides, where the clasps are, and where the sock clasp is, and then my buttons have more stress on them, and pull my shirt in a very unattractive way. I simply don't like the stirrups due to the fact they are uncomfortable, and they show where your pant leg ends and until your shoe begins.  I like the 4 strap option so that I can use them in a myriad of ways, and attach where I need to, to best utilize me.

Again, so far I really like these straps.
I will review again in a few months to make sure quality is holding up!
I would add a photo...but no body needs to see that.
summary: and do not like to look dis-shelved

reviewText: The design and pattern is really nice, I only wish it had been a better fit. I'm a big girl, but not the kind with gloriius curvy hips fit for a fertility goddess, that most plus-size clothing manufacturers think all plus size women have. I'm shaped more like a rectangle with boobs... because of this, it's difficult for me to find two piece swimsuits that fit both on top and on bottom. Most of the time I'll fit in the tops but the bottoms will be these huge sagging bloomers. For the most part it fit really well, with one exception. And so we return to the boobs. I have D's, and the cups on the top were way too small. I was overflowing through the top and the sides. I ended up giving the top to a friend who has small Cs, and the cups fit her a bit small too, but not enough to bother her.

oh my goodness! what a gorgeous suit. i had zero expectations and they were far exceeded. the top is constructed way better than most China bikinis I've gotten, with a bit of push up/lift to the cup. I'm a C cup, size 20 and I got the xxxl (22/24). the bottoms fit perfectly, the top is for at least a DD if not larger but it works fine for me. the print, the mesh panels are even better than the photo which never happens. very well made suit, I would pay double for it. the only problems i have found is the metal hardware on the top is super fashionable, but it does not stay. the top could be strapless so that's nice but I think you'd have to crimp the metal hardware to ensure they don't pop out of the holes which won't allow the suit to be strapless or halter style if you want it. also, the bottoms are not as high waisted as pictured, but they still offer a lot of coverage. i love this suit, wish I had found it earlier
summary: Review for multicolored02 bikini, love it with caveats

They wash beautifully, no shrinkage if you follow directions. I wear mine every chance I get to relax. Wonderful! We both have multiples because the prices can't be beat.

Tiny pucker mark in the lower right hand corner on the front, but it's not a big deal. Feels really soft (fake leather material). The latch is very sturdy and should hold up nicely. The colors aren't as vibrant as they seem in photos. But all in all, for only $15, I'd say you get a pretty nice wallet. And captain america, bonus.
summary: The latch is very sturdy and should hold up nicely

I ordered these polarized glasses in the purple frame with blue lenses color. Normally I don't like glasses that have the colored lenses but these are great! I use them when hardening, golfing and pretty much any outdoor activity! The color is amazing, they don't even compare to my other glasses. They also came with a sturdy cade, which I keep handy in my car and a cleaning cloth which definitely comes in handy. They are very well made and unlike the cheap glasses I normally buy, I think these will last me years!

I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest, unbiased feedback. I am not affiliated with this company, nor am I obligated to leave a positive review.

Wow! These sunglasses are amazing! Alright, so they come packages in a nice, matte black cardboard box. Inside the box is a high quality zippered hard case. This is a very nice case - it has a metal zipper, not a cheap plastic one. The case also has a great black carabiner too. As I unzipped the case, I found that it was chucked full of goodies! There is a note from the makers. An awesome little screwdriver key chain. A drawstring pouch. A microfiber cleaning cloth. And of course the sunglasses themselves!

One can never have too many pairs of good sunglasses. That is what I always say. This is the part in the story that I tell you about how I was offered the opportunity to try these wonderful sunglasses at a discount in return for my honest opinion in the form of this review. So here I am. The sunglasses are seriously the best ones I have ever had. The frames are a lightweight metal that fit my face nicely. The nose pieces are the kind like you get on regular prescription glasses (no the molded kind) and they adjust to your face really well. The lenses are great too! Really good at blocking the sun without blocking the view. I can wear them over my regular glasses too, which is pretty cool.
Material is terrible. Really cheap quality. No free gifts were included.

reviewText: Perfect

I have the hardest time finding bras that fit.  I measure 31" around the ribs with a tape measure, but every traditional underwire bra with a 34 band cuts into my "back fat" even on the farthest hook.  It's uncomfortable and you can see the lumps through my clothes.  I decided to try these bralettes as an alternative, and I'm so glad I did.  They're incredibly stretchy and comfortable, the padding covers my nipples, and the seams don't show under my clothes.  Because they're stretchy, there's very little support, but I think anyone on the smaller side would love these.

I purchased these as my daughter wanted sandals for school, but I do like opened toe shoes at school (on the playground or an unexpected sports class etc.) So I chose these as an inexpensive alternative, (as kids grow out of shoes yearly) also as an add on item to an additional order. This aside I still wanted them to do the job and be functional cute, summer to fall, then winter into spring school shoes, also possibly be passed down to her sister, so I did shop around and read reviews.
Firstly many reviewers said they ran way small (like a whole size), so I ordered a size and a half up, (which was only a half size bigger than her new school tennis shoes) so she could get the school year out of them. Well when they came in she they were way too big! so I don't know if they really run much smaller than expected, I would say they are fairly close to true to size,,,, these now will probably fit her two years!

** Secondly the reason I gave these only one star, (and this is my bad) I read mostly great reviews 4-5 stars only concern was the size. BUT there was one reviewer that gave the only bad review, and that was about the quality, she said they did not even last one day on the playground when her daughter wore them to school, that the shoes came home terribly scuffed on the toes, like the toes actually worn off! Well THIS also happened to us! I should have turned away after reading that one review but I didn't, so I guess it is my fault.
My daughter also came home after wearing these shoes for the first time today, and the toes are mostly WHITE !! they are that scuffed. Not just scuffs, but the color completely gone! worn off ! And she swears she did not do anything out of the ordinary, just regular school yard play, and average classroom activities. Knowing my child I believe her, yes she is very active and does run around, swing, climb and crawl thru the tunnels on her school playground, but I've also watched her play and know she is not rough or excessive when she is playing.

So my review --- STAY AWAY from these shoes, these are cheap as far as shoes go, so I guess I got what I paid for, but even at almost $17 I thought they world last maybe six months. NOPE, unless you are only looking for a pair to last one day, and during that time your child will not ever be going outdoors of running/crawling/jumping/skipping around any, save your money, spend a little extra on a quality brand, I DO NOT recommend these!
These will not make it through the whole school year, I am embarrassed to let her wear them even one more day as they now look so terrible, and these most certainly will not last to be past down to her little sister :(

(on any kind of plus side, she still thinks they are pretty, and says we can try to color over them a bit. And even though they are a little bigger than we wanted, she says they are comfortable, if that is any consolation)
summary: Toes worn off after one day at school, STAY AWAY from these!

reviewText:
I love these earrings they go with any attire you wear. They are not flimsy or cheap looking with a nice weight that isn't too heavy.
I received these at a discounted price for my honest review.

These earrings are a very bright silver tone color. These are Silver plated over a metal alloy base. They look very pretty. They are large earrings. They measure about 30 X 35 mm in total size. They remind me of large coins. I would say these are Medium weight. Not super heavy but not light earrings. If you have sensitive ears they might be heavy for you. I can definitely feel them on my ears when I move my head from side to side. These have a very pretty design. The 2 leaves toward the bottom are decorated with little clear crystals. Then you have the nice open vine metal work on the rest of the earring. The edge of the earring has a rim all around. Please see my pictures to understand what I mean by that. These earrings close with a latch that clicks closed in a little bracket. You have to line it up just right so it goes between the bracket and then just press down. I use my nail to push the latch up to remove them. The latch holds well and it has not opened up by accident on me. Nice fun earrings with pretty details. *****DISCLOSURE: I received this item free of charge to evaluate and review. All opinions are my own.

reviewText:
Even with the modest quality and cheap price, this top is very cute and fun for young women and even teenagers, provided that they do not have a large bust. Perfect for the summer and casual settings, you can use the bands to fashion the top in many different ways. The prints and quality are just as advertised and potential buyers must pay go carefully over the sizing information.

The shipping took about a month to North America. The item was fairly packaged and did not have any odor stemming from it, unlike most imported clothing. I was not impressed at first look out of the box as it seems to not have much to offer. Its quite a simple top made with cheap polyester-type material. However, I changed my mind later when I tried it on.

The material is not very high quality but considering the price, it is acceptable. The fabric has some stretch and is very silky soft. I wore it for hours and was quite comfortable the whole time. I have very sensitive skin and yet I did not experience any rash or itching after having the top on. The long bands also are quite stretchy and allow for a number of different styles in which one could fashion the garment.

The sizing is Asian standard BUT the seller has given enough information for prospective buyers to make the right decision. I usually wear XS or S and my bust size is 34 B. The medium (M) fit perfectly and just as the descriptions had promised. I must then say: if you have a C+ cup/bra size, the medium will NOT fit well. So, beware of that. Just read the sellers information carefully and you should be fine!

This top is very fun and sexy for younger women, also appropriate and even kind of sporty for teenagers. The prints are vibrant and diverse. I got this peacock skirt to have a nice dressy skirt for church. It is an ankle length skirt with two layers. A dark solid bottom layer and the peacock feather printed outside too layer. It looks just like a peacock feather, there is no bleeding of colors or jagged lines. The turquoise is very pretty and has a lighter turquoise printed feathers on it along with the yellow/Brown/orange peacock feathers. It is an elastic waist band that has white around it with a white tie with three beads on each tie for decoration. The beads are Pink, green and yellow. The reviews I read said to go up in size, and I did. It was accurate, I went up one size and it fits fine but if it was any tighter I would want another size up. Very pretty and fun skirt!

Overall, I love this top and will prob wear it all the time this summer :)

I can also use that if I have something wet and just want to hang it on the back of my backpack To dry so I don't have to put it inside with all of the dry stuff I have. I like the fact that this bag rolls up and fits into its own pouch that is constructed onto the bag and not separate. It is a little bit hard to get rolled up so it looks perfect like it did when you first purchased it but it doesn't have to look good just has to work. I'm very pleased with this product.
